We came down for the Marathon and this is a perfect spot for that slow walk home from the finish line! The team were really helpful too and responded very quickly to our queries. Thanks again! :)
Fantastic place

Easy Check In
Clean Flat
Great Location

The location of this apartment is great in Covent Garden near to Leicester Square and Piccadilly. Everything was spotlessly clean even met the cleaner on the way out ! Was a bit nervous about the security deposit as the website was a little vague but everything was fine and was returned. Communication with the stayo people was great with any questions they were able to get back in good time.
Excellent location, clean and comfortable. Good value for your money.

The flat is a great place to stay.  Right in the middle of everything, just a few minutes walk from Covent Garden & Leicester Square.  The flat itself is really spacious, easy to access and was spotlessly clean.  I'd definitely stay again next time I'm n London.
Great location amazing (Email hidden by Airbnb) fortable clean easy process.  Would stay again
Great location in central London. A very roomy apartment which was fully equipped with everything we needed. Would book again

The location and space are very good but this apartment is long overdue a renovation and that spoilt it for us. Heating wasn't working in the kitchen/diner and it was cold. Stairs are difficult, especially with luggage, but this is noted in the description. Two groups staying in the top apartment we're trying to enter ours late at night (not believing they had to go up even more stairs).
Great apartment. Very central and lovely and clean. The stairs to access the apartment are very narrow but we were made aware of the stairs before our visit.

Luis was very welcoming. Their place was exactly as described, newly and tastefully furnished and spotlessly clean. It was close to transport, shops and cafes. I also appreciated the breakfast cereals, teas and coffees they offered. Very thoughtful. I'd definitely return! Thank you Judith and Luis

We booked a 4 nights visit. Luis was here when we arrived at midday. He showed us the big and beautiful home in a very quiet neighborhood. The house is like 5-10 minutes from Kings Cross. All the house is new and really well arranged.
We had a beautiful room, small but nice, and we share bathroom and toilets if just an another room, which is very pleasant because it's not with all the house.
Breakfast is included and you can use kitchen whenever you want to eat.
Luis gives us his phone number when we arrived so we could call him for any advices.
From the house you can go whenever you want in London in 10-15 minutes with the tube which is awesome.
In conclusion a great host and I will definitely recommend this house and if I come back I will book it again.
Posto ok per una notte a Londra..non di più! Luis gentile e il "B&B" silenzioso e ben raggiugibile. Peccato fosse un poco spoglio...

I found this great place for two of my friends who were coming to visit me in London. They loved it ! Luis welcomed them in the best way possible, was very kind and gave all the information necessary. The room was perfect and the house lovely. Couldn't have asked for more ! Definitely recommend :)

We had a very nice stay in this lovely apartment. We didn't meet Luis but he was really helpful and friendly. The location was good, about a 10 minutes walk from Kings Cross and the tube. The neighborhood is really quiet. I would definitely recommend this apartment! Thanks a lot.

The house was pretty good, because it was near the station and most place which we wanted to visit. Besides, the house holder are so kind that provided something ( include drink and fruit) for us to eat for breakfast.

Luis répond rapidement et a été arrangeant pour l'heure d'arrivé (eurostar en retard).

Chambre à 15min à pied de St Pancras, propre.
Toilette, salle de douche partagés avec une autre chambre, mais celle ci n'était pas en location ;)

Bon rapport qualité/prix

Luis was a great host, very warm and friendly. He was always on hand during my stay if I needed anything, not that I did as I was well catered for.
The property was in some respects better than I was expecting. It's a well equipped and very clean property having been newly renovated and quite spacious.
I enjoyed staying there and would definitely go back.

Bien qu'absents, nos hôtes ont toujours répondu à nos messages avant et pendant notre séjour. La chambre était conforme à ce qui nous avait été décrit, la maison était très agréable et très bien équipée. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour et referons sans doute appel à ces hôtes pour notre prochain passage à Londres.

Listing description was very accurate. I enjoyed my stay and Judith and Luis were extremely friendly. We had great privacy in our room and really enjoyed access to the kitchen and fruit, granola, coffee, etc. for breakfast. Would definitely recommend.

A nice and warm stay, and the location was very convenient (10-15 minutes walk from the St Pancras station).
The room and commodities were very clean, and breakfast and fresh fruits were available which was great as we arrived late and woke up very early.
Judith and Luis replied very quickly to all our questions, all was very convenient. We are really happy and will recommend it!

Luis met us at the appointed time and was a very gracious host, he could not of done more for us. The description of the room was spot on and the neighbourhood was lovely and quiet. We enjoyed our stay very much.
The place came as advertised. Superb location and the in home amenities were modern and well maintained. The host was pleseant, although I only saw him once at check in.

A room near King Station for my girlfriend and myself. The room was easy to Luis was here to greet us.
Appartment shared by many visitors, more akin to an hostel than to a lodge.

They weren't really present, but we had access to the kitchen so all in all, it was fine.

We recommend for a short stay, but it's more in the idea of an hostel than a house.
Luis es un muy buen anfitrión y dispuesto. Excelente ubicación. Todo muy limpio y el cuarto muy bien. Todo muy bien.
Hôte super serviable. Environnement très agréable, conforme au descriptif, chambre à l'arrière malheureusement un peu bruyante du fait d'un métro à ciel ouvert juste derrière la maison

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour, l'hôte a toujours été disponible quand on en avait besoin et il nous a conseillé. Très beau logement et à proximité du métro. Si nous revenons à Londres nous reviendrons certainement dans ce logement !

Charming, cosy and very friendly environment. Very clean, awesome facilities and adorable details (such as massive kitchen with all you need for a good breakfast or the scented towels in every room). All you would expect from an excellent hotel with the familiar touch of home, sweet home.
Great location and very easy to get to. Place was clean and today and the same as photos. Enjoyable stay thanks
Very friendly and lovely house.
yes!
5 stars staying. Absolutely recommend! Been back here again so that's the evidence I'm quite happy with all.
Good location good house.

Highly reccomended. We felt like at home. We didn't meet Judith and Luis, but their friend Ricardo was always there to help us for anything. The appartment is clean and fully equipped, and we got breakfast whith the cereals, fruits and milk provided. My son was worried about the shared bathrooms (!), but there are enough toilets for everybody. We liked the neighbourhood as well, close to Angel and its bustling life.
Was welcomed and shown around the house which was clean and tidy. My room was comfortable and I enjoyed my short stay. Would definitely use again.

Luis greeted me at the door and immediately showed me around his beautiful property. The room was honestly bigger than I expected, as "cosy" usually means "micro." The bed was big enough for two, comfy and made up nicely, and the room still had space for a desk and a wardrobe. The house itself has recently been done up to a very high standard and is in a fantastic location.

Highly recommended!

Great stay for an overnight visit in London. It really is only a 15 min walk to King's Cross Station. Luis provided a brief tour, was very accommodating with my check out time, and very communicative- he always responded within a reasonable amount of time and was never hard to reach. Overall, the apartment was clean, tidy, and stocked with snacks. There are a few other people who share the apartment as well, either other tenants or Airbnb guests, so if you're looking for complete privacy and not just a private room, that is something to consider. Even so, I had a great experience. Thank you!

Luis responded right away to every email before I arrived, giving clear directions and warm welcome. He was there when I arrived, showing me around the house, and made me feel at home. Everything was very clean. The location was convenient to either walk or take public transportation anywhere I wanted to go. The kitchen was stocked with coffee, tea, and lovely fresh fruit, cereals, and milk. The wifi worked very well, a bit plus for me, as I was there to work, not vacation. I recommend without hesitation.
Amazing place. Best host you can have. Very central location.

Had a great and comfortable stay in London.  Loved the location super close to kings crossing which made it extremely easy for my husband and I to walk early morning and late evening.  Nice neighborhood and wonderful hosts.  Instantly felt welcomed after a 9 hour flight.  Showered (separate toilet room was excellent). Comfy pillows, window in bedroom, clean, and private.  Would gladly recommend to family and friends visiting London.  Guys were super friendly and a pleasure to meet.  Safe travels everyone and enjoy.

Logement fidèle à nos attentes.
Nous etions un couple de passage à Londres pour visiter 3 jours cette ville.
La maison est pripre et équipée. Nos hôtes etaient tres flexibles pour notre arrivée et notre depart, ce qui nous a aidé pour nos trains.
La maison est située dans un quartier sympa, à partir duquel nous avons pu tout visité en bus.
Very good location, landlord is nice.

Camera pulita e accogliente in una zona molto tranquilla. A disposizione c'è una cucina molto attrezzata con doppio lavandino, doppi fuochi, doppi forni, i bagni della casa sono molti quindi non c'è mai stato problema di trovarli occupati. King's Cross si trova a 15min a piedi (o a 5 min in bus), a 5 min c'è la zona di Exmouth market piena di bei locali e ristoranti lontano dalla confusione delle zone più turistiche, da lì con 10 min di bus (19 e 38) si raggiunge la zona di Leicester square/Piccadilly.
Gli host sono stati molto disponibili e forniscono risposta immediata.
Sicuramente consiglio di soggiornare qui.
Host made us feel welcome and everything as expected.

i have been staying here most of the time when i am in london. they have huge kitchen and lovely place to sit out. and large common area. luis is very good person and he helps in everything. Ricardo is also amazing. they manage this property with lot of care. i will continue to stay here every time i visit london. they try to accommodate me most of the time.

the location was perfect for accessing kings cross train station. we arrived a bit late abut luis was there to great us.we had everything we needed and met other travellers who were friendly and interesting.

Fantastic location.  Walkable to everything including London West End Theatre, Kings Cross Tube.  Immaculately clean house and quiet.  Good restaurants within walking distance.  Great place to stay and excellent value.
Good overall experience.
great place to stay had everything i needed

Checking in and out were very flexible.
The neighbourfood was charming and very peaceful. A great (=good food) Vietnamese restaurant nearby, called Sen Viet.
The walk from King´s Cross station was a bit annoying (10-15 min) when tired and wet but the location was clearly announced in the description.
It was great that there was complimentary fresh fruit, cereal, tea and coffee.
The room was quite small for two people. There wasn´t a lot of places where to hang our towels, clothes or other things.
I think there were three bathrooms in the appartment and it wasn´t a problem during our stay, they were always available.

La casa è facilmente raggiungibile coi mezzi ed è in un ottima zona. Vi sono diverse stanze (non si è gli unici ospiti della casa) e i servizi sono in comune ma è tutto tenuto molto in ordine. La cucina è il punto forte della casa. Abbiamo incontrato solo Ricardo che è stato un padrone di casa eccellente

The house was really near to Kings Cross station.
There were lots of buses to the city center.
The house was really clean, very cousy and welcoming, the only thing we notice was a little noise because off the subway that passes really near, but the windows cover much of the noise.
Ricardo was really welcoming.
The check-in and check out was really easy and we could do it at the hour that suits us the most.
There was breakfast available and it had a variaty of things.
Very good experience

We enjoyed our stay at Luis' and Ricardo's very much. We arrived way too late due to a delayed flight and we had forgotten an adapter. Both did not pose any problem. Ricardo was very flexible and always ready to help us. The rooms were very nice and clean. There are more than one bathroom, so there were no problems in this regard either. The flat is very nicly located and public transport to the city centre, Kings Cross and to Camden Town is very close by. Exmouth market with nice cafes is in walking distance.
They are most wonderful host you can ever get.
I had an amazing stay, the location is great and they are really flexible with the times, 100% recommended
Our stay was great! Exmouth Market had a lot of good food and drink and it was an easy walk to public transit. I would definitely stay here again!

Luis und Ricardo waren sehr nette und hilfsbereite Gastgeber, und dIe Lage der Wohnung (10min zu King's Cross bzw. Angel) sowie die Ausstattung (insbesondere die sehr große Küche) sind prima. Sehr empfehlenswert!
Hôte disponible pour accueil suivant arrivée trains

Wir wurden von Luis sehr freundlich empfangen und bekamen eine kleine Hausführung. Wir hatten Zimmer Nr.3 was voll seinen Zweck erfüllt hat, unter anderem genügend Ablagefläche, Steckdosen und einen Schrank. Wir teilten das WC und Bad mit dem Nebenzimmer was kein Problem war, war alles sauber. Im unteren Stock befinde sich eine große Doppelküche, Esstisch und Wohn-/Aufenthaltszimmer. Die Küche ist gut ausgestattet, Müsli, Milch, Kaffee so wie frisches Obst steht zur Verfügung. Aufgrund der recht Zentralen Lage haben wir London ausschließlich mit den "Santander" Fahrrädern die es überall in der Stadt gibt erkundet (nächste Station von der Wohnung ca. 2min zu Fuß entfernt).
In dem Haus gibt es 7 Zimmer auf unserem Stock waren 2 Zimmer wir haben aber von den anderen nicht viel mitbekommen.

Wir hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit bei Luis
Wir kommen gerne wieder.
It is very nice  place ~the place  is near  to the  Kings cross station  and  the host  is very nice ~great experence
100% worth it, and a great way to see a bit more of London. Would recommend to anyone.
주인분 너무 친절하시고 좋아요 빨래도 무료도 주방도 자유롭게 사용가능해요! 과일도 먹을수있게 되어있어요!
Really great location, comfortable room, great kitchen. Would definitely book here again!
very lonely place,very kind host,give us useful advice,i will come again if i still have chance to London

This place is a good base for a stay at London, close to Kings Cross and all traffic systems, the central kitchen provides everything for a good breakfast or break during the day, friendly and relaxed atmosphere.
Adresse super. Très bien situé. Lit très confortable. Hôte très disponible. Merci pour ce très bon séjour.
Great place, great location. Communications excellent, check-in was smooth as you like and the accommodation was tidy, well equipped and comfortable. Would be more than happy to stay again.
Luis&Ricardo 호스트는 정말 친절해요. 안내나 불편한점 바로 확인해주시고 위치도 정말 좋아서 저녁늦게까지 많이 돌아다닐 수 있어요. 그리고 샤워실 물파워가 엄청났어요!!

My boyfriend and I were greeted immediately on our arrival. Ricardo was friendly and showed us around and offered us fruit, cereal and all sorts of goods. All in all a very nice experience with a cheap, private and clean room (and good hosts).

We had a perfect stay here. The room was clean and easy access to anywhere in the city we planned to go. Easy access to the 63 and 17 bus, underground at either Kings Cross or Russel square, and trains at Kings Cross. It's also a very easy walk to Covenant Garden area, River Thames, and more. The shared kitchen, living room, and bathroom (there were multiple bathrooms and showers) were kept clean and well stocked with toiletries, food (fresh fruit, cereal, and milk), and dishes. We also were able to do our laundry there which was so helpful for us!  We had a great stay and I would recommend this to anyone looking to stay in London!

La estadía en casa de Luis & Ricardo fue excelente! Tal cual aparece en las fotos, el lugar estaba impecable y todo era muy cómodo (pieza, cocina, baño, buen wifi).
Recomendable 100%
A great stay exactly as described. And nice touch with fruit, cereals etc

Amazing little place here. Close to St Pancrass & Kings Cross. Very quiet & away from the mad traffic. You get a room with a closet, shared bathrooms (multiples), and access to a kitchenette (cereal & fruits provided) & a living room with TV, also a small back yard. They also provide a complimentary electric adapter (but we brought our own). You get your own key to your room to come & go as you need to. There are other tenants & they were all respectful & quiet. Easy check in & check out. Great place to stay! We would stay again!
Amazing place, I hope to stay here again!

Room was very nice and clean. Great kitchen with some fruit and cereals provided. Luis and Ricardo are very nice and supporting.
Just the noise from subway is a little minus, but it didn't bother us too much.

Je conseille vivement aux personnes qui souhaitent visiter Londres quelques jours de se loger chez Riccardo & Luis. Les lieux sont propres, il y a plusieurs toilettes et douches, la cuisine est grande est bien équipé, on a même accès aux machines à laver au besoin. Petit bémol sur le parquet qui grince, du coup on entend quand les autres personnes marchent à proximité. On entend aussi un peu le train mais pas de quoi empêcher de dormir la nuit. Rapport qualité prix très correct
It was a really pleasant trip ! The house is clean and beautiful. The host is really thoughful. Meeting people in the kitchen is also a good thing :) We enjoyed it and would come back !
Another good evening's sleep in this well appointed, quiet house.
Great hosts, spacious clean room in handy location
Wonderful stay! Ricardo was very helpful and went above and beyond for us.
Nice place and host

Très bon séjour à Londres avec mon fils de 11 ans chez Luis et Ricardo. Le logement est idéalement situé à 15 minutes à pieds de la gare et de la station de métro. Le logement est bien équipé et confortable. La grande cuisine commune donne  l' occasion de rencontrer d'autres hôtes de nationalités différentes. Des fruits sont agréablement mis à notre disposition ainsi que les ingrédients de base du petit-déjeuner. Luis et Ricardo sont disponibles, joignables et prêts à rendre service. C'était parfait !

It's was amazing stay again. Must have been by 100 night at this place over last 1 year. Luis is perfect host as always. I could surely see some more improvements. Garden was improved further and some nice flowers in it. And also some showers and kitchen stuff added. So now house is even better. Would come again soon. This place is always occupied, so if you are thinking to book. Don't waste time. As if will get sold out soon.
Great Location and super helpful communication. Thanks Luis & Ricardo.
I had a pleasant stay here - Luis and Ricardo were very responsive, rules were made clear, and everything was neat and clean. In a very good location as well.
Great hosts as always
Exactly as appeared in add. Clean room. Luis and Ricardo very helpful despite very late check in. Would stay again.

Good, quiet location. Nice room with bathroom next door. Well equipped and stocked kitchen. I didn't use the TV lounge but it looked fine.

I will be back
Great spot!

It's a great place to stay - many amenities and a very flexible and service oriented hosts.  We had some travel oddities at strange times, and Luis and Ricardo made arrangements with us to accommodate - we're extremely grateful! As for for location, the property is a 15 minute walk from many northern city locations (including the British Museum :) ) and the bus stops on the next street over.  An excellent value with excellent hosts.
Clean room in a good location with tons of amenities - exceedingly well run. Would absolutely stay again.

I was going to London for a last minute business trip and found Luis & Ricardo's place as a first time stay. Everything was fine and the shared areas of the apartment are very spacious and well equipped. Great value for money!
Highly recommend, another great stay!
Great as usual, se you next week!
Luis and Ricardo's place was perfect for our overnight stop off in London and they were extremely friendly hosts
Great hosts, always a pleasant stay. Highly recommend.
This is a cute, comfortable spot. Shared space with fellow travelers, and the hosts are friendly and helpful.
Great hosts as always, thank you once again!
Perfect location, excellent facilities, absolutely loved staying here – we will definitely be back next time we're in London!
위치해있는 지역이 좋았고, 나름 깔끔했음. 호스트는 의시소통이 매우 잘 되는 편이었음. 다만 우리가 묵었던 방은 사진대로 좀 작은편이라 답답한 감이 없지 않아 있었음. 그래도 추천할만한 숙소였음.
The location was ideal and everything I needed was made available. Really accommodating with check in time as well.
Отличное расположение, маленькие комнаты, но большой зал и кухня, отличный дворик для вина и фрукт в тишине. Иногда слышно поезд (или метро). Рядом 3 узловых станций метро.
Absolutely great room！The host is very nice and he kindly gave us a larger room. It was super spacious master room with a private bathroom. Great value for this room. Thank you for hosting us

Luis es muy amable y la casa esta impecable. Muy cómoda, con varios baños y una cocina amplia donde siempre hay fruta y cereales a disposición. Nosotros caminamos desde la casa al Tower bridge sin ningún problema y disfrutamos el paseo. Cuando quisimos ir más lejos, caminamos hasta la estación Kings cross esta a 5 min y usamos los buses, underground y overground. Nos quedamos por 4 noches y recomendamos totalmente quedarse en esta casa para visitar Londres
Great location! Near everything but a bit out of the hustle. Great common area and kitchen facilities. Would stay again!
Lois and Ricardo are really friendly. The place is great, with everything we required.

Fantastic stay at Luis and Riccardo's place. The flat and room are very clean, well decorated, bright, I instantly loved the place! The location is great and both Luis and Riccardo are very warm, nice hosts. Thank you for your hospitality, I can only recommend this place!
We felt at home!

Luis and Ricardo's place is nice and clean, and they are very welcoming. Usually there are several people staying there, but there are plenty of bathrooms, so it wasn't a problem for us. The location is very convenient, about 10 minutes walking distance from King's Cross. In case you are easily bothered by noise, keep in mind that you can hear subway trains every few minutes from inside the house. The noise is not loud, it's more of a background thing.

Luis is passion and friendly, there are big kitchen, livingroom, garden, prvide complete kitchenware and some food, everything is so nice, Unfortunately, we only stay 2 days, and his house is too popular, one day we go back, must live there longer.
Luis is very nice. The environment is good and very quite for sleeping. Recommend.

Luis and Ricardo were amazing, helping a lot with the late-hour check in and with all the information we needed.
The house was clean and confortable and they also provided really nice breakfast.
Very well located, we could easily use subway, bus or even santander cycles.
It was a great choice and we'll be back! Thanks guys!
Functional place with nice kitchen and yard. Close to King's Cross station. Nice high ceilings and natural light in room 3. Can hear the tube nearby.
Luis & Ricardo’s place is super clean, secure and warm.  It’s a 10 minute walk up from Farringdon - really easy to get to.  I’d definitely book it again

Location is as described, the Underground is a 10 min walk away and easy to find. Amenities are all there with everything you need within walking distance. Rooms are clean and tidy as well as the bathrooms. Would recommend this place to everyone looking for a great location to London and value for money.
Another excellent stay, thanks guys.
Tudo ok
Buen lugar y buena ubicación, cerca de la estación de trenes

Awesome place! Easy commute, close to everything, very convenient. Luis was an absolute great host. Very helpful, quick to respond and gave me good tips around the city. Breakfast essentials and fresh fruits were provided by Luis which was AWESOME! I highly recommend to book your stay with Luis and Ricardo.
Amazing place to stay, very hospitable and friendly guest who also gives extras such as breakfast!

My boyfriend an i enjoyed our stay at Louis's place. Given that im allergic to dust, i did not face any problems and everything was neat and clean. The atmosphere is really friendly and warm and the hosts were very welcoming. I would definitely recommend it and take it again whenever im back to london.
Thoughtful and helpful hosts. Will stay here again if I return
Piso en zona residencial, muy cuidado y bonito. Gran cocina y varios baños.
Very nice host and the house is as described, near kings cross station, well equipped kitchen. It's really great to stay here during my London journey.
Great place and lovely hosts. Comfortable bed in a lovely house. Highly recommend, and would book again.

Really enjoyed my short stay here. The price was much cheaper than any of the surrounding hotels and the location was good, only a 15 minute walk from Kings Cross. The house was clean and there were plenty of amenities. I also enjoyed chatting to the other guests in the communal area. I think the house may be over the tube as I could hear something that sounded like trains passing by so I would recommend bringing earplugs if you are a light sleeper. However there were noise dampeners on the windows and I could not hear the noise with earplugs in so I had a great nights sleep.

Tres bon sejour chez Luis et Ricardo!

Dans un jolie maison typique londonienne, une chambre simple et propre nous attendait. La salle de bain petite mais fonctionnelle est au 2 pas ( au sens propre) avec des wc séparés, les deux à partager avec seule autre chambre.
Les hotes ont étés reactifs et discrets, nous les remercions encore de nous avoir gardé nos bagages afin que nous puissions profiter sereinement de notre dernier jour.
Le petit bemol reste le bruit de train décrit dans l'annonce. Présent sans pour autant empecher de dormir, il ne nous empêchera pas de revenir lors de notre prochain escapade!
Safe and quiet location. House is large and well equipped with a nice garden. Good transport links . Great stay!

Ricardo welcomed me nicely and showed me the entire place. It was really nice and clean and the area was nice too.

To have coffee, tea, cereals and fruits there for us was a great plus !

Great place - as described.
A little bedsit like, but great kitchen and shared lounge.
Room and bathroom etc were nice and clean.
Great value.
Will stay again.

Very nice location 10mn by walking from saint Pancras (but very quiet)
The apartment is shared with other hosts (each having their room but sharing bathroom). Everything was clean and cozy. Due to the closeness of the room you can hear a bit the other room. There was a heater in a room which was nice because of the cold.
Luis was very friendly and accomodating with us leaving our luggage until our train. There is a big kitchen downstairs where you have your breakfast (milk and cereals are provided).
Very convenient to Kings Cross and Central London  yet very quiet, which is my main priority. Very simple but comfortable.
Great location location for me walking distance to the office.  Great room everything I needed.

The reception was excellent and we felt welcome right away. We could leave our bags even though we arrived in the early morning, that gave us the chance to explore the city in the meanwhile.
We started our mornings with the complementary breakfast, which where great to have, the location was ideal to start our daily visits to the city center via bus or underground and took about 35 minuted including walking and both the rooms and the showers/toilets where very clean and well maintained.

Overall we can only say that the accommodation was perfect for us!

Thank you Luis & Ricardo for your great hospitality.
Great space huge kitchen, great shower. Well organized. Perfect place to stay.
Good location, friendly hosts and clean house. We would definitely stay again! :)
It was a great experience. The house is super central. If I go back to London, they would be my first choice. The ratio quality/price was excellent.
Great location near Kings Cross.  Generous fruit and breakfast cereals provided.   Very friendly and obliging host. A caring and considerate environment.
Great location. Friendly host, easy living space, plenty of breakfast fruit options.
It was as nice as ever. It is the second time and I would recommend it to anybody.

Very friendly host. Ideal location for Kings
Cross area.
Good location and fast Wi-Fi

Los anfitriones fueron amables y atentos, estuvieron a nuestro servicio siempre que los necesitamos. La habitación y las instalaciones estaban muy limpias y bien decoradas y estaba bien comunicado en transporte público con todos los monumentos y lugares de interés de Londres.

Sin duda una experiencia totalmente recomendable!
Great location,nicely furnished house,everything was clean. Luis and Ricardo were always there to help with any question. Hope we will be back soon!

I have stayed here before so I know the area, the square, the property and the hosts.  All good, Luis was very responsive and good communication.  Would always come back and recommend to future a guests.

We stayed there over the weekend and had a great time. Location is easy to find and relatively close to the center. Check in was very easy, Luis showed me around and offered local tips. We could use a huge shared kitchen and living room in addition to bedroom. Breakfast was offered in a form of fruits and cereal. Overall, very good experience. Definitely recommend staying there!

We spent two nights in one of Luis’ rooms! Check-in was incredibly easy, and Luis responded quickly and was flexible when our check-in time had to change. We were able to check-in in the middle of the day at the time of our choosing, which was very convenient since we just had a long flight and a lot of baggage. The room is pretty small and simple, but comfortable enough. We shared a very tiny bathroom and shower with other travelers staying in the room next door, but it was never an issue. There were many amenities downstairs, including a full kitchen and TV room, but we didn’t end up having the time to indulge in them. The building is in a quiet neighborhood about a 13–15 min walk to/from King’s Cross, so something to keep in mind if you are looking to be closer to the tube. However, King’s Cross is a huge transportation hub that will easily take you to many of the main sights of London, so it’s convenient to be close to, even if it feels like a bit of a walk at the end of the night!

Thanks Luis & friends for an enjoyable experience!

Desde el momento que entramos quedamos encantados con el alejamiento y sus servicios. Luis siempre fue muy amable. Ofrecen frutas, cafe, cereales y leche para el deayuno sin ningun costo adicional. La cocina es de uso general para todos los huespeded pero nunca tuvimos que compartirla. La ubicacion es a 8 cuadras de king cross, fuimos y volvimos caminando con las valijas, respecto a las principales atracciones está un poquito alejada pero no fue un problema pq el transporte publico es excelente. El baño es compartido pero siempre estuvo limpio y nunca nos cruzamos con nadie.

First of all - a really nice host - always smiling and really helpful. Great location - 10min walk from Kings Cross station - from there you can get anywhere on tube (there's also bus stop just outside the house, but we never used that). Cosy typical London house with multiple rooms for multiple guests - large kitchen with all the necessary appliances and, of course, fresh fruits, cereal, tea and milk! The only thing that I might add as unpleasant (at first) is that there is a tube line opening near the house, so you can hear the trams goin by every minute, but they stop at midnight. Luis was kind enough to offer us ear-plugs for better sleep, but I took a more medical approach with a couple of beers :) Overall it's a great place for the price - I would definitely recommend.
A great price, in a great location for Clerkenwell/Farringdon. Would certainly recommend for any one-two night trips to the city.

Logement bien agencé, pensé pour les voyageurs. Relativement calme bien que suffisamment central. Chambre relativement petite mais correcte, cuisine immense !
Luis a été très réactif pour ce qui est du départ et de l’arrivée. A recommander
Room is in a great location. Luis was very clear in all communications and thoughtful regarding our stay. Thanks Luis!
This was a cozy spot to stay near Kings Cross and Exmouth Market. The backyard is very nice and the kitchen is fully stocked.
Great location, not far from Kings Cross and with fully equipped kitchen we felt like at home.

I loved how close this place was to Kings Cross and public transportation. It is very clean and convenient to get to. There was a wall charge converter provided, which was perfect because my mom and I brought the wrong converters. Luis was fast to respond and was very hospitable. I recommend this place and will plan to use it in the future.
The host allowed us to drop the baggage’s prior to the check in time.  The apartment is very accurate to what it’s written and exactly as it’s shown on the pictures .

Luis was kind enough to let me into my room early, which after a long day of traveling is very appreciated. Everything was clean and tidy. Great shared areas. A little bit of a wall to the tube, but there is a bus stop out front. Would recommend.

Great place. 10 min walk from King’s Cross which was really convenient. Nice little neighborhood and easy to get to buses. Room was as described and nice little touches like water and glasses on the bedside table. Would stay here again!

Great place near Kings Cross. There was cereal and fresh fruit available in the big kitchen which had everything necessary to prepare a meal. Location was great, a 10 minute walk to Kings Cross station. There was also a bus stop right outside. Luis was very quick to respond when we had any questions.
Luis was very gentle and fast to answer for any question we had. Additionally, he was very flexible and we could leave our luggages after the check out. Place was very well-located.

La ubicación es muy buena porque King’s cross tiene conexiones con casi todas las líneas.
El hospedaje es divino, decorado con muy buen gusto.
Los baños se comparten con los demás, pero es casi como si fueran solo para vos (hay baño y ducha por piso).
Definitivamente lo recomendamos!!

Luis was very kind and welcoming. The room is clean but little noise from the train.  Luis proposed us to drink coffee and eat something at the breakfast, very good! Thank you a lot for your hospitality

It was already my second time at Louis place and I think I would even go there a 3rd time! The area the house is located in is really quite and safe, nevertheless there are multiple bus stops and of course king's cross just a few minutes walking away. We had everything we needed

Luis is an excellent and efficient host. Though the room’s a little small for 2 people with 2 luggages (not to mention 4...), Luis made it up with his genuine hospitality and was kind to provide fruits and light breakfast such as cereals and hot chocolate. Do note that the toilet size is rather small so I wouldn’t recommend it for people who are claustrophobic. Overall, Luis’ place was clean and accessible. It’s just 2-3 bus stops away from King Cross Station. His place was indeed a home away from home. Thank you Luis :’)

We spent three nights here and enjoyed the very spacious kitchen, the large and comfortable shared living room and the clean organized space. Our host Luis was very accommodating with a late check in time. The courtyard entry from the street has beautiful trees and we felt very safe and comfortable here. We would recommend it.
房子坐落于位于国王十字圣潘克拉车站走路15分钟的位置，小区附近十分安静。但是最好早点回家。房东十分热情，也待客有道，我特别喜欢底楼的客厅和厨房，设施便利温馨，有机会还会入住。
Another extremely comfortable and quit stay thank you.

Great stay with Luis. He is very helpful and allow us to do earlier check in. The room is not big but it is enough space for both of us and our two big luggage. The bed and pillows are very comfortable. Free cereals, milk and fruits are the bonus
Das Zimmer und das Badezimmer auf diesem Stockwerk waren etwas klein, dafür war die Küche sehr groß. Gute Anbindung an die U-Bahn, dafür hört man aber auch die vorbeifahrenden Züge.

this place is great for what it is. it's nothing fancy, but for these prices you shouldn't be expecting fancy. place was clean. we never had a problem with privacy or noisy neighbors. we felt safe and secure. and the location is FANTASTIC. if your looking for a short stay in London with an easy location for getting around the city, this place works just great.
Luis responds very rapidly and wait me to check in.It's so nice of him.
Wirklich ein guter Host. Wir würden jederzeit wieder bei Luis übernachten!
Friendly host and cleaning staff. Good location and all the amenities you’d need
Luis very nice!

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour, Luis est très accueillant, le logement est très bien équipé et se trouve à proximité du métro. Le seul bémol, les couvertures étaient peu trop courtes.
Nous recommandons.

I have stayed at this house before in different rooms and Luis & Ricardo have become my friends. I don’t want to look at other housing options before coming to London because I know they can help me out. The house gives you everything, and although the hosts might sometimes be busy they will always do their best to help you. Hopefully it won’t be long before I come back!
The space is exactly as shown. Very quiet shared space with other guests and was clean. There are clean linens provided and breakfast foods along with fruit in the kitchen.

accueil chaleureux, les touches d'attention pour le petit dejeuner sont superbes!
on entend un petit peu les voisins de chambre ainsi que le train mais Luis a tout prévu en mettant a disposition des tampons pour les oreilles.
emplacement a 5min à pied des bus. tout a super bien fonctionné!
Una estancia perfecta, gracias a Luis, muy simpático y amable. La casa super equipada, limpia, bien ubicada. Si volvemos a Londres será aquí. Un 10
The check in was very convenient, and the hosts were incredibly responsive.

The house is very nice and located in a very nice and quiet area! Lots of cafes and shops around.
I walked to the city center.
The room is small, but you can use the kitchen and the living room downstairs and that was very nice. It is quite noisy in the room during the day because you can hear trains, but it didnt bother me at night
There are other guests in the house.
Everything is decorated very thoughtfully. And generally everything is thought through for the guests in the house.
Kitchen is big and perfectly equipped. There are fruits in the kitchen which was amazing.
Communication with Luis was easy and nice.
I would recommend this place to anyone and stay here again

nice house! however as an asthma sufferer it was a bit to dusty with all the carpet and tapestry. If you get lucky you might see wild foxes running through the park in front at night. The owners respond quickly and are very accomodating. You can hear the trains, but we got used to them fairly quick
Wondeful place, great location, close to restaurants, very clean, communication was prompt. The room is just a little chilly.
Great location ! Super cute decor !

Our stay at Luis's was a real pleasure. First, being able to drop our luggage before our room was clean was really convenient. Then, the house itself is big, well-equiped, really nice. Luis himself is a very charming host, responsive and diligent. I would definitely recommend staying at his place, and would come back to his place when I'm back in London !
Nice place, great kitchen. Very good service and flexible check-in
Beautiful house in a perfect quiet location, at the same time close to many places! Fruits in the kitchen, coffee, everything perfect

큰 캐리어 두개 펼치면 공간이 끝날 정도로 둘이 쓰기에 약간 협소하긴 하지만 나름 지낼만 합니다. 위치는 킹스크로스까지 걸어서 15분 정도 거리긴 한데 큰 불만은 없었어요. 다만 밤늦게 숙소로 올때 좀 무서울 수는 있어요. 숙소 관리가 잘 되는거 같고 부엌이랑 공용공간이 쾌적하고 좋아요. 화장실과 샤워실도 층마다 있고 세탁기와 세제도 무료이용 가능하고! 부엌에서 과일과 커피 우유 시리얼 등을 무료로 이용할수 있어요. 런던 중심가에 이 정도 서비스 이정도 가격이면 최고 아닐까 싶습니다. 추천해요!
非常方便，服务周到

Luis’s place was the perfect spot for a weekend in London. My girlfriend and I did not meet Luis but communication was excellent. We found the keys in a box because we arrived very late over night. Everything went smoothly well. The only small issue we had was the bathroom (the one next to our room was a little bit small) but compared with hostel’s prices in the area and everything it was a great deal for a quick weekend in London. I would highly recommend Luis’s place.

Tuvimos una excelente estadía en este hospedaje. La comunicación y el trato con Luis fueron excelentes. La ubicación cerca de King Cross vale mucho la pena. La casa es bellisima, con detalles para sentirte en tu casa, súper comoda. Desayuno más que suficiente. Puedes cocinar lo que quieras. Todo limpio y cuidado. La habitación está impecable.
Muy agradecidos porque en pocos lugares te sientes tan cómodo como en tu casa.
Recomiendo 100% este hospedaje en caso de no poder alojarte en un apartamento entero, sin duda volvería.
Saludos!
Ariel y Carolina.

Le logement de Luis est accessible très rapidement à pieds depuis King's Cross (10min). De plus, le logement est propre et Luis mets à disposition le nécessaire pour un séjour confortable. Néanmoins la proximité du métro peut par moment être dérangeante par son bruit important.
A convenient and clean room, ideal for a short stay near Kings Cross.

I’ve stayed at Luis‘ place now for the second time and it’s simply great! Luis is such an awesome host! Super responsive, extremely helpful and nice :-)
I can only recommend this place!
We stayed in a different room this time which was a bit smaller but as described and it’s still fine for a few days.
All was clean and nicely decorated. Also Luis provides breakfast incl. fresh fruits which is awesome.
I will definitely come back the next time when visiting London!
Good room, very professional host, no hassles checking in, great facilities and the wi-fi was fast.
Great space and extremely convenient location for touring London.

La ubicación es excelente muy tranquilo el lugar pero cercano al metro y al tren.  También hay lugares para comer bien y a buen precio. El dto es muy acogedor si bien la habitación es un poco justa igual que el baño. La cocina es muy completa. Lo recomiendo 100%.
Lovely place, fully equipped, and a great host! Definitively a treasure at the hearth of London

camera un po' piccola ma nel complesso ci siamo trovati bene.
non abbiamo mai incontrato Luis ma è stato sempre presente per ogni nostra necessità.
posizione comoda, ci sono circa 10-15 minuti a piedi dalla metro.
abbiamo apprezzato molto la presenza di frutta e altro essenziale in cucina e ancora di più il distributore di acqua potabile. ci tornerei

HIGHLY RECOMMANDED!
The flat is perfectly located, super confortable and clean. In addition Luis is really accomodating and very fast when communicating via messages.

Es una casa con algunas habitaciones para húespedes, muy bien unicada (cerca de la estación de tren y subte). El host super amable y habla en inglés y español. En la casa había un montón de detalles que la hacían cálida y cómoda. 10 puntos la cama y ducha!Super recomendable!

Luis is really nice and friendly, reacts in messages a bit slow, but ok. Good check in and check out. The room small, but enaugh space for couple - we only rested at night in there - all day exploring London. A bit noisy - you can hear the tube, luckilly on Sunday it was really quiet, you can even hear the birds singing. A bit far from tube station - 15-20 min. on foot. It is a lot when you are tired after all day walking around. The was always fruits, granola, cerials, milk and honey, tea, cofee - this was very nice! They recycle litter - also nice. But... Kitchen was always smelly from someone’s cooking, greasy pan and other stuf. Old house - you can hear while somebody is walking in coridors. All in all a nice place if you are not willing to cook and you like walk a lot :)
Excelente lugar, muy agradable y súper céntrico.
Another great stay here! Friendly, clean, convenient for local transport. Thanks very much!
My girlfriend had a nice stay there
Luis' place is in a very quiet neighborhood right off of the main street about a 10-15 minute walk from King's Cross. It is very clean and he provides breakfast! Super friendly and great host!
Once again great accommodation and lovely host. Our preferred B&B in London. Thank you, Luis! :-)
Couldn’t provide a stronger endorsement - absolutely excellent in all respects.
킹스크로스역에서 10분정도 거리고 방은 둘이서 지내기에 딱 적당합니다. Luis는 만나면 항상 친절하게 대해주고 우리가 영어를 잘 못해서 제대로 얘기를 못한게 아쉬웠습니다. 그리고 시리얼과 과일이 제공되어 매일 아침 아침식사 걱정할 필요가 없었습니다. 또 샤워 수압이 엄청 강해서 좋았어요.
Would recommend Luis‘ appartments
Fantastic place to stay, excellent location, lovely and clean and very hospitable. Will definetely stay again.

This host and house went above and beyond for us. They were kind and extremely hospitable. It’s a great location being so close to King’s Cross.
I would highly recommend staying here if you are looking to stay in the London area!
Great place to stay!
킹스크로스 역에서 거리가 조금있지만 엄청 좋고 편안했습니다
Die Küche war super, wirklich groß und es gab sogar eine Saftpresse. Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt, gerne wieder.

Court séjour agréable. La chambre est parfaitement propre et agréable. Très proche de la gare st Pancras. Le logement est calme. Reste le bruit de fond du métro mais qui n'empêche absolument pas de dormir. Je recommande.
离国王十字站很近，房东响应及时。屋内设备都很齐全。
Fantastic service-- really nice surprise there is free laundry service and dryer -- hand over a bag of dirty clothes and two hours later a pile of well folded clean clothes!

일단 위치가 너무 좋구여!
깨끗하고 화장실도 엄청 꺀긋하고
세탁도 무료로 할수있어요
지하에가면 먹으라고 시리얼이랑 과일도 있구
호스트분이 너무 친절하셨어요 !!
여자 둘이라 좀 걱정했는데 잘 있다갑니당
추천해요 !!
The home is incredibly clean and quiet which makes for a great stay. The shared living spaces are quite spacious which is great. The location is also ideal for exploring the city.
Great host, great location and great service
Great location near to central station. Free cereals and fruit for breakfast.
Amazing host, very reliable and lovely house !

Luis is a fantastic host.
The location was great and accommodation is like home from home.
I will definitely be back.
Thanks Luis.
Great place, would stay again!

The house is amazing! We stayed for 2 weeks and don't have anything to complain about. Our bedroom was close to the bathroom and always clean, just like the whole apartment. Luis and Ilona are always open to help and if you need anything they will surely make a way to solve things for you. The location is great, easy to access and lot of public transport around. Thank you for everything!
Best Wishes, Mayumi and Canato.
Perfect place to stay !!! Great location , Clean and comfortable .

Before my arrival, my communication with Luis was very warm and friendly and informative.  He let me know that he was expecting me, and I continued to keep him updated with changes in my plans throughout the day.  This accommodation was truly the most cosy environment that I've stayed in within the Greater London area.  I was so impressed with the amount of common space that guests were given liberty to use, including the comfy couches in the living room and 10-seater long wooden table in the dining room area, use of the beautiful well-groomed garden, an incredibly well-stocked full sized kitchen with a central island with bar stools and cooking facilities and everything you could possibly need to cater for yourself and your party as if it were a fully-furnished efficiency apartment.  I didn't have time to go grocery shopping, but I did order sushi from a nearby restaurant through Deliveroo.  I used the plates and glasses and cutlery from the kitchen, and it truly felt like ordering out and eating in from home, as I watched an evening film on the large screen telly.   Everything was SO clean and new.  It seems this accommodation was recently remodelled, with fresh paint and tapestries and furniture.  There were scented oil diffusers in every room that kept everything smelling so fresh!  Disposable masks were available for guests, but were not required.  All guests were asked to remove their shoes if they wished to go to the downstairs level where the common rooms are located.  It looks like the carpeting is brand new, too!  There were many lovely paintings and wall hangings and vases of flowers and mirrors that added to the warmth and décor.  I stayed in Room #3, and there was more than enough space for my suitcase and clothes in the double wardrobe, along with a hair dryer in the bedside stand and kettle on the top with two mugs and  complimentary coffee/tea on the serving tray.  The bed was super comfortable with plenty of pillows.  The window was frosted which allowed full daylight in whilst still maintaining privacy from the nearby neighbours.  The drawn curtains blocked out all light at night, and allowed me to sleep very soundly both nights of my stay.  Although it wasn't an en suite room, there were only two rooms (#2 and #3) on that floor that shared a common toilet that was separate from the shower and sink.  Loads of extra blankets and pillows were available in the alcove of the same hallway, and the well-lit hallway made it easy to find everything you needed, such as extra blankets and pillows if you required.  Although this location is very near the local underground and Luis and Iona offered all guests foam earplugs (in case you're a light sleeper), I honestly didn't mind the gentle rumbling of the trains that passed every 10 minutes or so.  It just felt like "white noise" to me, which I would expect in a large city such as Greater London.  Luis' and Iona's directions were spot on, in how to get from King's Cross Underground directly to the accommodations.  It's located in a quiet neighbourhood around a green square in the centre where there is a lovely children's playground.  I felt very safe and cared for in this place, and I was warmly welcomed by both of my hosts.  They are lovely, good-hearted people, and I will definitely return to this location in the future.  This is a true, undiscovered gem, and I so wish them well in great success for many years of good business to come.
Lovely stay - very accommodating and great to have the use of all the kitchen facilities. Appreciated luis stayed up late to welcome me :) thank you!

A nice alternative to regular chain hotels with clean, characterful rooms and a large shared kitchen. Luis was very friendly and helpful. Be aware that you can hear the sound of trains passing in some rooms which didn't bother us much (it was actually quite relaxing) but plenty of earplugs are provided if you want to block that out. We would stay again.

beautiful house in a quiet neighbourhood but with good bus links and a short walk from angel and kings cross, was perfect for my partner and i who were only in london for a night because we had the whole city on our doorstep. luis was friendly and helpful, made us feel at home, and the room was really pretty. lovely garden to have a glass of wine in and cereal provided at breakfast - a great stay, thank you :)
Great location for transport, bars and restaurants. Nice feeling neighborhood. comfy bed. Facilties set up for sharing with other guests. Clean cosy room.

Lovely flat in a great location - very close to shops and cafes! Flat is spacious, light and comfortable and comes with everything that you could need!

Host James is very responsive, easy to contact and will reply very quickly!

Would definitely stay here again, thank you very much!

Very welcoming host, lovely and home and great communication. Location is good, next to a small park with great views of London. Received email ahead of stay with all information we needed. We really enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend.

The description of the flat on the website matched the reality. There was a welcome bottle of wine. The accommodation was just what we wanted but there were some niggles. The bath plug got stuck in the bath and prevented the water from draining. This was fixed the next day. The TV didn't receive terrestrial channels in the living room and had to be re-sited to the dining/kitchen and retuned. There was no cafetière or percolator for coffee.
James was very responsive to the plug problem, but the other issues need to be sorted quickly

La maison de James et Sophie est très chaleureuse, spacieuse, très bien rangée et très accueillante. Nous n'avons malheureusement pas rencontré James et Sophie, mais leur accueil , vin et Haribos compris, a eu un grand succès! Merci à eux pour cette attention!

We really enjoyed staying at James’ apartment. It was very cozy and nice and clean. The area is a hidden gem in London with a spectacular view of the city of London and Canary Wharf.  I can highly recommend it.

Simply, we were very happy with everything about the flat.
James was helpful in terms of checking in and out times, and giving us his number for any queries throughout our stay. We used to live in the area, so already know that it is a nice place to live, close to central London but not too close. However, the benefit of being right next to a park (with open views from the kitchen) is an incredible bonus which would definitely make us come back. The hill up to it is a bit of a challenge but it's steep rather than long, so is over pretty quickly, and means you get great views.
The flat is well laid out and furnished; smart and elegant but lived in (obviously!) so feels comfortable and easy to relax. Particular favourites were the super king bed and the kitchen/diner - where we could have easily hosted friends.
Searching to find something negative to say, there were a few lights not working and the bathroom is a bit of a squeeze, but nothing significant that affected our stay.

James' place was lovely. The space is quite spacious and felt very cozy. Not in central London but perfect if you'd like to experience a taste outside of your usual tourist route, plus it's very easy to get to the train station and access all of London. The neighborhood is beautiful and there are many small restaurants nearby which is very convenient! Overall a great stay!
The place was such a nice,  clean, cosy, lovely and comfortable.  It looks better in reality. We fell in love with the kitchen and their seasoning cupboard

This was a great place to stay for me and my friends. We were comfortably able to fit three people. The kitchen was well stocked in regards to cooking utensils and spices. The place was clean and James provided plenty of useful information for us before we got there. The neighborhood felt safe and it was easy to get into London via the Overground.

Only drawback is the hill the flat is on which is pretty steep, but it is also short so it was manageable.

James left us a lovely note and a bottle of wine.  He also provided excellent information about the public transportation.  We asked a lot of questions!  Their place was absolutely ideal.  Just a short walk to the rail station to get into central London.

Beau logement un peu éloigné du centre de Londres mais accessible facilement en bus, même de nuit!
Merci!
Another good stay. James' flat is comfortable and convenient, and the park next door is gorgeous on a sunny day. Thanks!

Staying at a place like this is an experience in itself. We found all the possible conveniences there and enjoyed the authentic atmosphere of an English home.
It was incredibly generous of Jamie and Sophie to share this wonderful place with us.
After our three-day stay we left the place with a deep feeling of gratitude.

It was lovely to stay in James' house! It was cosy and comfortable. He left a nice welcoming message with a bottle of wine! Although we didn't meet James during our stay, we had everything we need. So there wasn't any issue at all. I loved the garden and the view at the park right behind the house!
We've stayed at James' place a few times now, and had another lovely weekend. Great flat, great location and good value. Thanks very much.

We had a great stay in James' home, everything was perfect, very clean, we had everything we needed,
bed was so comfortable,
perfect!

Comfortable stay in a cosy apartment. Filled its purpose. My boyfriend and I came for a short stay in london. Easy to drive into central london and friends nearby. Easy checkin  and comfortable stay. thanks!
James was very accommodating. The apartment was clean and is a lovely homely place. Great location for London visiting.

James' flat was exactly as pictured and we had a great stay there! Everything was clean and James was a really helpful host and great with communication. It was not that difficult to get to the centre (would take about 40mins with the route we took) and we would definitely recommend staying here.

James's place is very homely and James is a welcoming and helpful host. The flat is in a lovely quiet area and there are fantastic places to eat very close by. The place is cosy, clean and functional. Travel to London is simple and quick.  We would recommend James's flat as a perfect base for exploring London.

This was our first Air BnB booking.  At first the feeling of being in someone else's space was a bit strange but we soon got over and loved the preview into their lives.  We enjoyed our weekend and everything we needed was available and clean.   The area was safe and loved the park right next to it.  Not too far from the tube but if you have a lot of luggage like we did, we would suggest you Uber because the last bit is a little steep.  Thank you James & Sophie.  :-)
This property was just as it was described. Prompt communications. Spectacular views over London. Ideal for us to visit family in the city. Thank you James and Sophie. Thorougly recommended.

The flat is just as described and absolutely loved the styling of the place. Restaurants and fast food places close by with the station only a 10 min walk away. Plenty of parking. Would definitely stay again. Thank you to James and Sophie for being great hosts.

James and Sophie have a lovely home takes around 40 minutes to commute to central London. A great place to stay if you have a family, great for chilling out at the end of a day out in London. Thanks for having us, would recommend!!!!

The property was in a great location with easy access to the train and bus. The instructions for getting into the house and accessing WiFi were easy to follow. The host was very nice in leaving us a bottle of wine. Finally, the house was clean and the bedrooms were spacious

James’ and Sophie’s place has an excellent location, right next to the wonderful Blythe Hill Park with amazing views over London. The apartment is very nice, convenient and stylish. Communication was great, with quick responses and they were very friendly and helpful. Honor  Oak Park station is within short walking distance, and also buses and other stations close by. We really appreciated staying in James’ and Sophie’s house and would love to be back.

We enjoyed our stay at the James and Sophie’s flat. It was a very homely place and there was all the comforts of home.
The location was very close to public transport and there was a comprehensive guide that helped us plan our stay. They were also very quick to respond to any queries we had.
Fantastic location, and an amazing view of London! Great place.
Good location and fast respond. Everything is basically perfect :-)
Lovely apartment and a good location. Hosts were super helpful

We are a family of 3 and this was our first air bnb experience.We could not have chosen a better home or better hosts as James and Sophie were so responsive and their home lovely! It was like home from home, and we cant wait to stay again!
Characterful apartment in good location with easy journey to London Bridge. Great communication.

La casa di James e Sophie è molto carina, accogliente e molto ben attrezzata, in una zona residenziale tranquilla e ben servita dai trasporti locali. Per me è una soluzione eccellente per trascorrere qualche giorno a Londra. Io e la mia famiglia siamo stati benissimo.

Lovely home, with lots of nice touches throughout. Communication was good and the whole process was very easy. Beautiful views on the street across the rooftops and over to the City in the distance. Honour Oak is a lovely area.
Genial!  Bona gent i un gran lloc per visitar londres

Lovely homely space, very comfortable, very clean. Clear instructions on gaining access with keys and quick response via Airbnb messaging to queries. Close to bus routes to Waterloo and London Overground station 30 mins to London Bridge. Lots of places to eat in Honour Oak (10 min walk) and fab handmade pizza in The Chanos pub (5 mins walk). All in all a very comfortable convenient accommodation.

We are very grateful to the owners for their hospitality. This house is perfect for couples with a child. Very quiet location in London, full furniture, very comfortable kitchen, large soft bed, excellent bathroom, and most importantly - a wonderful park right next to the house. For our little baby it was a real discovery.
Great place to stay. Lots of space, clean and very close to a lovely park. Many thanks!
Lovely stay in a wonderful and quiet area of London. James and Sophie are the perfect hosts

We had a great stay at James & Sophie’s home. The location was great and they gave us very good information regarding check in and transport links. The space worked perfectly for us as a family of 4 with two young children. The garden was such an added bonus - beautiful!
Great location, exactly what we were looking for!

it is a place where you can stay comfortably for a couple of days for visiting london.  However, cleanliness is an issue, furnitures, equipments are a bit old and for the money that I had to pay, it would not be my first option when I visit London next time.

James and Sophie's apartment was perfect for our family.  Two large bedrooms - one room spot on for children.  There is a single bed that's perfect for a child, along with a crib (if it's needed).  Kitchen fully equipped, and everything spotlessly clean.  Communication was excellent throughout our stay as well.
A lovely home from home. Great for getting into London, great views, and good value.
A wonderful stay for our friends wedding. Super quick response to any questions we had and a really smooth and easy check out!

due to my thoughtless planning I was a day early.  Despite the inconvenience James was a good host who helped us further with hotel and taxi.  So we still had a great first night.  Then we could go to the nice house of James and Sophie.  Because it is on a hill you have a beautiful view over London.  we had a great weekend!

The flat is in a lovely location and has lots of homely touches. It was exactly what we were looking for as a base for our stay in London.
Thanks James & Sophie
Pleasant place in a quiet neighbourhood. James & Sophie are great hosts!

Really great house, very nice spot, next to a park with a cool view of London, quiet and not too far from the city center. This accommodation is so welcoming and warm, we feel at home. Thanks James & Sophie for sharing your piece of paradise.

We had a great stay at James and Sophie's apartment. Beautiful, clean apartment, close to the park and perfect for our little family of 4 with two small children. Easy access to transport and we loved being close to the park. James and Sophie were really responsive and checking in was very easy. We would be happy to stay here again!
Es un hogar muy agradable, muy buena ubicación, comercios cerca, estación de tren para fácil traslados...sus dueños son muy agradables, muy atentos y se preocupan por todo.

Vacanze dal 2 al 5 gennaio 2020.
Ottima accoglienza di James e Sophie, chiarezza ed immediadezza nelle informazioni necessarie e nei dubbi esposti prima di partire. Il modo in cui ci hanno risposto dimostra competenza e professionalità. L'appartamento era confortevole, accoglienze e sufficientemente spazioso per due o tre persone. È ideale per una coppia anche con un bambino o per due adulti. La pulizia era ottima così come anche l'ordine nella casa.
Se c'è tempo, il parco dietro la casa offre l'occasione per meravigiiose passeggiate più o meno lunghe, magari il mattino o nel pomeriggio prima dell'imbrunire.
È da considerare buono anche il rapporto qualità/prezzo.
Sono a disposizione diverse linee di autobus, che raggiungono in tempi ragionevoli il centro di Londra o le principali attrazioni turistiche attorno al Tamigi.
die Wohnung ist ideal, wenn man sich mitten in London ländlich fühlen möchte.

The house is clean and pleasant.
unfortunately the heating was not enough and we were cold during the day
We had a fantastic stay. It is a lovely home. Family friendly. Really good location, just next to a great park friendly. Cannot fault it.
A lovely flat in Honor Oak Park close to the shops, restaurants and two stations. The flat was exactly what we needed for our stay.

Great location and great host.
Thank you.

Such a beautiful flat next door to a wonderful park with absolutely breathtaking views of London day and night. But it's up a very very steep hill (important info for guests with disabilities especially). Spacious and perfect for small children as the flat is all on one level.

The bedrooms are huge, and the master-bedroom bed is a massive superking and so comfy.

The placement of the bathroom was a bit of an issue for us, being practically in the kitchen. Not a big deal if you're all super-familiar with each other, but a huge deal if you're not. We had to put on the extractor fan when using the bathroom (tmi I know - sorry!)

The flat felt more lived-in (actually felt like the hosts had just popped out for milk) than any other Airbnb we've stayed in. That's not a bad thing necessarily, just made use more aware it was another family's home. The plus side of that is that the flat feels full of love and warmth.

Access to the garden was blocked by a bike, which was a shame (I know we could have contacted host in effort to move it, but just didn't fancy dealing with that on our week away).

Some basics were missing/not quite right - like no cloth to wipe surfaces, no kitchen towel, and only 2 rolls of loo roll for a family of 4 for three nights. In the middle of a pandemic, a bit more emphasis on those things would have been appreciated. Again, I know we could have asked for more, but it was easier just to buy what we needed.

Overall a really nice stay, and we're grateful to James and Sophie for opening their home to us. Thanks!
appartement bien situé, excellent accueil, très bonne prestations

We did not have the chance to meet Lauren in person but we had good contact via email.
the flat is nice, well located (close to shops and buses ) and well decorated. We stayed here with our little girl and baby boy.
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We absolutely loved our stay in Lauren's flat! It truly felt like our home in London, the street is lovely and the flat is charming, bright and comfortable. We will be back for sure!
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Chez Lauren, on se sent tout de suite comme chez soi. L'appartement est aussi joli que sur les photos et tout est très propre. Le quartier est très agréable et parfaitement desservi par les transports en commun. La rue est bien calme. Nous avons eu une excellente communication avec Lauren et Joe pour l'arrivée et le départ.
Excellent séjour !!!
Un grand merci (many thanks) Lauren et Joe
Todo fue excelente en el piso de Lauren, muy limpio, ordenado y bien ubicado para llegar a cualquier lugar rápidamente. Super recomendado.

Great location and flat looks exactly how it does through photos. The kitchen has big windows where you oversee the garden which is beautiful. But if you're sleeping in the living room, be aware you'll be up when the sun is!

Great stay!

O apartamento é ótimo, limpo, organizado e muito bem decorado. A Anfitriã é muito atenciosa, educada e responde rápido. O único problema é o transporte público. Não há ônibus entre o apartamento e a estação do Tube. Recomendamos muito!
A very nice large flat in a great location. Short walk to the underground and buses and several food stores very close makes this an ideal and economical place to stay when visiting London

Joseph was the perfect host - his flat was super stylish and fully equipped with everything we needed for our stay. It was very handy for everywhere we wanted to be - Dalston and Shoreditch are just a short stroll away. Joseph was quick to respond to all enquiries, reliable and very friendly. We will definitely be back next time we are in London! Thanks for a great stay Joseph!

Joseph's apartment in Haggerston, London was perfect! My friend and I stayed there for a month while we were working in London and immediately felt at home in the apartment. The transport links are great, there are tons of shops and restaurants around and Joseph was always super quick to respond to any questions we had.

Joseph's apartment was perfect for our requirements.

It was nice and clean with plenty of space for all guests and had everything we needed for an enjoyable stay.

Plenty of amenities nearby and a short walk to bars and restaurants in the area. The overground is literally a 2 minute walk away and plenty of buses run from the main road.

The apartment block is very secure and easy to find and Joseph was always on hand by phone if we needed anything at all. He met us when we arrived to show us around and how things worked.

All in all, could not have had a better experience staying in his stylish flat. I would highly recommend.

Joseph was zelf niet aanwezig tijdens ons verblijf maar laat zich wel omringen door fantastische mensen die ervoor zorgen dat je aankomst en verblijf aangenaam verloopt.
Hij was wel telkens via mail en telefoon direct aanspreekbaar. Helaas was er een probleem met het internet. Zowel hij als zijn entourage hebben er alles aan gedaan om het probleem te verhelpen. Het mocht niet baten, maar we waardeerden hun inspanningen enorm.
Het appartement was perfect gelegen om London te verkennen. Het was steeds aangenaam thuiskomen na een vermoeiende dag.
Zeker aan te raden als je niet direct in het drukke centrum van Londen wil verblijven, maar toch wil genieten van alle voorzieningen op wandelafstand. Bedankt Joseph!

Great place in every way
Pleasure to deal with Joseph
Would recommend to anybody
Big thank you

This modern apartment in an old school building is really nice, even better than we expected. its located in the cute area haggerston with loads of small restaurants/cafés and just a short walk to Shoreditch. Joseph replied to our messages very fast. We can definitely see ourselves staying here again!

We were a party of five plus a six month old baby. Meet and greet went very smoothly and photos and description of the house were very accurate. The small toilet under the stairs had a "Please do not use" sign but with two other toilets this was not a problem for us. The neighborhood is very quiet (except at lunchtime when children play at the nearby school) and noise never disturbed us. A convenience store is close at hand along with cafes and restaurants; public transport is easily reached. Beds were very comfortable in the three double bedrooms and we used the single bedroom with a day bed as a peaceful study. We stayed during a hot spell but the house stayed comfortable and the backyard proved a huge bonus, especially for the baby. The internet was a bit erratic but their internet provider was having London wide problems during our stay. We recommend the house highly.
it ok, the house quite spaceful and bed is clean.

Loved this room. The electric banket was very good for us as it was so cold in London. Clean and nice spacious room. Stayed here twice and would come back. I highly recommend this property! Thank you Wynn :)
The host canceled this reservation 60 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The apartment is great located in the center of London, Wynn was very friendly and helpful.
Amazing location and lovely set up!

Wynn was not there while I stayed at his place but he was extremely helpful in every way by having his friend there to look over things. The apartment was large, clean and in a great location. I would definitely stay there again.

Wynns place was perfect in every sense! Very centrally located, a two min walk from Leicester square station. The room is big with a couch, tv, and cupboard for clothes. It even has a long mirror! The washrooms are clean and functional. Even though it's right on a busy street, you can't hear any noise at night which is great.. Would definitely stay here again!

Hemos pasado  unos días hermosos,  la habitación super grande igual a las fotos. Tenia todo lo esperado, Wynn super atento, nos brindó todo para el desayuno. Su ubicación es lo mejor nos movimos a todos lados a pie☺, volvería sin dudarlo
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
La ubicación inmejorable, cerca de todo. El anfitrión muy respetuoso y amable. El lugar está en excelente estado de limpieza

Wynn's flat is perfectly located by Trafalgar Square next to Starbucks, a couple blocks to SOHO and 10 minute walk to Picadilly Circus. Great host, great location, great room. Also wonderful restaurants and pubs on the street. Wynn arranged his schedule to meet our needs. Wonderful place! Next time we go to London, we'll try to stay here.

My stay with Wynn was flawless. Although I only saw him for 5 minutes the night before I left, he made me feel very welcome and the whole process was super easy. The room itself is large and comfortable and the location could not be any better! I would highly recommend this place if you want a comfortable and quiet room in the hear of London.
This is a amazing location that you can reach everything within 15 mins! It's quiet as well. Perfect choice for a short tour!

Wynn was a great host.
He made sure we felt welcome from the first moment.
The location is outstanding!
Bed comfortable, and kitchen and bath are immediately adjacent and very clean and accessible.
We would go back tomorrow!
J&M
very very comfortable bed and super convenient location!! Super valuable place!

Our stay here was terrific. Great location just two minutes walking distance from Leicester Square tube station. Everything you could possibly need is provided, including towels, toothbrushes, maps of London, slippers, and you can even use the kitchen (fridge, etc.) to store food and drink if you need to (Note: the kitchen is shared). The other occupants are very quiet and keep to themselves and we found our stay here very comfortable and enjoyable. The only thing that I would say made us a bit less comfortable is that the apartment can get quite hot at night (we stayed here in August) - there is an air conditioning machine but even so. I'd recommend to Wynn to put a thinner blanket in the room in summer so that it can be interchangeable with the very thick blanket that's usually there. But otherwise he thought of absolutely EVERYTHING, including the really nice shower gels and shampoos which were left on our bedside table upon arrival. This is a REALLY FANTASTIC place to stay HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
Excellent location to explore London.  Tube less than 1 minute's walk, Nelson's Column 1 minute the other way. Wynn was a very good host and easy to get on with.

Easy check in, and a generally very pleasant stay. The building is gorgeous, the flat very tasteful, and the room large and well appointed. I didn't meet Wynn, but our interactions were really positive. Recommended!

Perfect location! Very central making it easy to explore by foot or by tube. Quite a few restaurants, pubs, cafes, theater shows and shops in this area. Trafalgar Square, the National Gallery, Opera House, Chinatown, Covent Garden are all minutes away. Room is spacious as well, situated in a lovely building. Wynn was welcoming and very responsive. He was available to answer questions but also gave me privacy. Nice little touches in the room to make the stay convenient and comfortable. I had some minor issues connecting with the wifi, but I think it was an issue with my phone. Overall, highly recommend!

Great location, spacious and clean premises. We didn't meet our host but he is easily contactable by e-mail. The pillows weren't our cup of tea though and wi-fi is a little weak. Other than that, everything was to our satisfaction.

Highly recommended!! The room is exactly how it showed on the picture (and it even have a clothes cabinet too). It is indeed spacious, well lit, the entire house is very clean and smelling good. Bed is comfortable with heated sheets available. Towels and toiletries were provided with clean pair of slippers too!! (it feels like home, loved it). The couch is a bonus, a nice place to relax after a tiring day. Light snacks came in handy during our rush mornings.

Wynn wasn't there when we got there but he gave us clear, simple instructions prior to arriving on how to get inside the building and the room. No problem at all. He responded quickly to our emails when we had a question. The room has ready instructions, maps and all the little details to make our stay convenient. Wynn was also very helpful in providing us information and tips when we needed it.

The location is fantastic. Very very close to Leicester Square station, Trafalgar, London Eye, etc. Lots of good restaurants around the area and few steps away to Chandos. But the room is not noisy at all.

Wonderful, we will definitely stay here again!
met us at door, very friendly

If you are going to London, I suggest you come and stay with them. Wynn has been a lovely host, and I was sad when he had to leave me for his holiday.
