Hackney ist ein interessantes aufstrebendes  Viertel, das sich lohnt näher erkundet zu werden. Das Häuschen war praktisch und geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Besonders die Terrasse hatte ein tolles Flair. Uns fehlte an nichts. Leider konnten wir ihre tolle Check-out Zeit von 16:00 nicht nutzen. Wir kommen gerne wieder. Vielen Dank Helen.

We had a great experience staying at Helen's. Very clean and organised and well thought out. Helen was always quick to respond and was very understanding. The place is beautifully done and It was a lovely experience overall. Highly recommended.
Great location, clean and cheerful with a friendly helpful host

This space felt like home.  I loved having a piano and bookshelf’s full of diverse books.  The outdoor space was great for eating and enjoying a glass of wine.  Close to bus and London above ground line.

Persoonal place with lots of room and amenities in the bathroom. Kids really liked the "secret room" with one bed. Great balcony!!!

Breakfast is just small things to get started as Helen said, so better to visit the nearby shop as well.

I highly recommend staying at Helen’s place. It is cheerfully decorated, clean, and comfortable - it was so wonderful sitting on the terrace amongst all the plants on a warm evening. Helen’s place is within walking distance of shops, restaurants, grocery stores and public transit which makes traveling a breeze. Helen is also very communicative and responds to any questions in a very timely manner. She worked with me through some misunderstandings (on my part) which required a lot of patience on her end. Also- if you’re like me and love to read on holiday, Helen’s library is so expansive- there is something for everyone!

Our stay was incredibly comfortable and our host was so friendly and generous. The place was gorgeous and quirky with most fabulous sun terrace. Despite being near the centre of London the area was so quiet and peaceful. We would definitely love to stay there again should the need arise.
was such a lovely stay!! very nice place very close to everything and easy to navigate around. helen was a lovely host and made everything super easy and comfortable x

Charming eclectic flat with lots of thoughtful little things that all contributed to a wonderful stay. When we arrived, there was fruit and breakfast items available which held us over until we were able to visit a nearby grocery to stock up for the week.

It’s located in a lovely area where access to the Overground, 242 and 55 routes made easy trips everywhere we wanted to go. Even closer than that is the Stantander Cycle rental, which was an easy way to wander Hackney and Shoreditch areas on our own timetables. The nearby Broadway Market is a short walk along the canal.

Certainly would look to stay here again on a return trip to London.

Helen was an amazing host, since the beginning she was keen to make our stay as easy as possible. The house was perfect with plenty amenities, close to train station, local supermarkets and everything
5 out of 5

Helen est une superbe hôte et a un super appartement plein de chaleur bien placé par rapport à la gare et au cœur de Londres. Si comme nous vous avez la chance d'y aller quand il fait beau, vous pourrez profitez de sa charmante terrasse qui donne l'impression d'être dans un petit jardin à la campagne ! Merci pour tout, on conseille !
Great place and good location. Helen is a very responsive and accommodating host
Amazing property, feels like a real home! And very gracious hosts! Thanks!
This place is a real gem and Louise was such a great host. Don't look any further !

Louise and her family are lovely hosts.  The bedroom is very big, light and clean, with shutters for privacy.  The bathroom is very clean and light with a big shower.  While the space is shared with Louise's family the bedroom and bathroom are separate so it feels like your own space.  Louise has tea/coffee making facilities in your room, or you can join the family for breakfast etc.  We stayed on a beautiful sunny morning and had breakfast in the lovely back garden.  Louise recommended local places to eat and where to watch the bus into the city. The street is wide, has easy parking if you have a car and is close to shops, cafes and a local pub.  It is a nice place, not too far from central London to stay.
An easy and comfortable stay, thanks!
The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
In the Libanesen area full of really good restaurants. Close to hide park and major attractions really nice

karim is a considerate host. his flat locates  Betterton St,  near the bus station and ground station.  walking distence from hyde (Website hidden by Airbnb) bedroom and living room with specious  space . two big size sofas in the living room. and a well-equipped (Website hidden by Airbnb) is very suitable for family. our family had stayed for 3days in the flat.karim provided good service. it is highly recommend karim's flat.
Très sympathique !

Its a great apartment and Karim was super nice but we struggled with the noise from the street affecting our sleep. Not just the traffic; its right next to a bus stop and we could hear voices on the street too - it went on all night. Earplugs definitely required. If the bedroom windows closed more tightly it would probably be better.

It was a fabulous place, accessible from two tube stations. The apartment was clean and cozy. The location was central and just a couple stations away from Oxford Circus. The host, Karim, was always available, helping us whenever we needed anything. Had a memorable time in London and the apartment.
Beau appartement en quartier bien localisé..un peu bruyant la nuit...conseil: Demandez l’adresse à l’hôte car le site ne l’indique pas bien...
The accommodation is convenient which near to supermarket and underground. It is large for 6 people staying. Karim is helpful when we meet problems, he helped us quickly!

I would have rated this 2.5 out of 5 stars but AirBnB doesn’t have that option.

Pros - 12 minute walk to shopping area, 5 to 10 minute walk to three gorcery stores, 10 minute walk to the Tube and 1 minute walk to the bus stop. Also lots of coffee shops and Middle Eastern restaurants.

Apartment is clean. It looks, and stocked, as advertised. Affordability is also a big plus.

Cons - Apartment is just a floor above a busy bus station and chain of restaurants which can get very loud. Closing the window isn’t an option because it gets hot due to no airconditioning. In fairness, unavailability of airconditioning is mentioned in the details.

Worst days of 12 day stay was the first and last. First day my family and I arrived at 8am and were only given the key at 3pm despite a specific previous agreement with host that early arrival is fine. Host would not answer phone calls or emails until 3pm, and he sent someone else to hand over the keys. Imagine jet lagged and coming from a transcontinental flight with luggage and kids and not having a place to stay for 7 hours.

Weekends can get loud a floor below due to lots of talking in the restaurants. But on the last day of our stay, on a Friday night (perhaps due to an Iran football match, entire area seems to be a Middle Eastern sector) the street below was so loud because sports cars lined the streets revving their engines for no reason and played loud music from 10pm until 3am. Not even closed windows and bearing the heat inside could keep the noise down. We all lacked sleep and barely had time to rush to the airport for our flight.

Weighing the pros and cons, I wouldn’t rebook on our next stay.

I booked 3 nights, but only stayed for 1 night as we barely slept because of the heavy noise and lights from the street. Windows are broken and blinds damaged and don't cover lights from the outside. I also don’t feel the apartment is really suitable for six people (probably for younger kids)... In addition to it: cleanliness (bad), not enough towels, not enough sheets / covers for both sofas, etc...
I've tried to resolve this directly with Karim but he never responded.
Very clean and beautiful space but its a bit noisy at night

L’edificio in cui si trova la casa è molto vecchio e mette parecchia ansia.
La casa è molto più piccola di come appare nelle foto, la cucina e il bagno sono davvero piccoli.
Ritengo sia troppo cara per quello che offre.
an enthralling apartment, without a doubt made my trip even better .. wonderful

We were three guests. Location is extremely central and close to everything. It is a little noisy starting in the mid morning, as the street outside is busy, but didn’t bother us.
Quite clean. We didn’t cook but kitchen looked reasonably well stocked.
Flat amazing, I recommend
Tot be
The host was very nice.
Karim es una persona muy amalble y el departamento tiene una excelente ubicación.

In a nutshell Karim apartment is at an excellent location (Marble Arch and Edgware Station nearby) with excellent facilities and a very nice and humble host. The apartment is on first floor, very spacious, fully furnished with excellent furniture and all required amenities.
I really enjoyed my stay in the apartment and it was my one of the best Airbnb experience. I also recommend it to others. Thank you Karim for your hospitality

Appartement confortable dans la chambre et dans le salon sur le canapé lit. Petite cuisine avec frigo pratique pour les petits en-cas ( difficile de cuisiner cependant). Quartier agréable animé et secure. Nous recommandons cet appartement.
Very helpfull and kind. The flat is small but has everything you need.  The flat is based close to Underground and Hyde Park. Great area for eating.

The apartment is well presented in a great location. We used it as a base for a few days of sightseeing. Easily slept 2 adults and 2 children. We eat out while we stayed but we could have used the kitchen to cook. Would recommend and would stay again.
Great Host, nice Location, close to a Great pub(Monkey puzzle)

The location of this place was awesome, our kids were very excited to look out the window and see a red telephone box and red buses drove past. Karim meet us at the apartment so check in was very simple and the photos accurately show what the place looks like. It was very spacious and had good heating.
Great place with perfect location! Karim was very helpful. Can only recommend!
Boa localização, apartamento amplo e o Karim foi muito cordial, recomendo.

Appartement bien situé, proche de commodités (métro et commerces) et d'Oxford Street.
Par contre, il n'y a pas de volets et même si l'insonorisation n'est pas optimale, les bruits la nuit ne sont pas excessifs.

The apartment is great! It's well equiped and really spacious. Karim was really helpful every time we asked him a question. We totally recommend this place for a long stay! It's well located as well so we could walk to most places we wanted to visit. It's also close to a subway station and bus station.

It’s a beautiful apartment in a great location. Really close to Soho and all the shopping places. The apartment has been tastefully redone and looks great. We had a great time as we were able to walk to a lot of places from there.

I stayed with my family, wife and 3 kids for 8 nights. Amazing location, great apartment. I completely recommend this place. Very quiet neighborhood, close to shops, restaurantes, underground, parks, markets. Robert and Zak where always available for any of my requests. Apartment was completely renovated. Ill be back for sure!!
great flat in a brilliant location

Our stay was fantastic. I’ve booked Robert’s place last minute and he was accommodating for my sudden request. He also agreed for me to store my luggage prior to check-in time. The flat is conveniently located in the center of everything. Next time I need a flat to stay in, will definitely book Robert’s.
Robert was so nice and responsive throughout the whole process, the location of the place was amazing and so convenient. We will definitely recommend this to anyone one staying in London!
A wonderful location! Central to all the London must's.  Clean, efficient, and large enough for 3 couples.  What lacks in kitchen supplies, makes up for it with Robert's attentive team.
Great host.
Very stylish place in a perfect location. Well recommended.
Great apartment in a great central location.
Beautiful apartment in an amazing area! Very accommodating during check in. Would definitely stay again .
Loved this apartment in Mayfair!  Exactly what we expected it to be!  Great location, beautiful apartment and lots of good restaurants and shops nearby.   We will be back!
Great place , greay location, and very nice and helpfull host :)
A very beautiful flat on a top location. We would love to book a next stay!
The location and unit are both outstanding. This has 3 great bedrooms all with en suite bathrooms, plus a half bath, and nice living space & kitchen. I will go back again for sure!

my family and I had a wonderful time. probably one of the best locations in London coupled with a great apartment that offers everything. We were well looked after at check in. I will definitely be revisiting with my family when in London!
Super clean and nice appartment in a quiet and very nice area. Expect to see some nice cars
Very good location and modern flat.

This flat is as advertised. Highly recommended, clean and very spacious by anyone’s standard. . Close to major tube stops.
Communication is prompt and helpful.
No need to look further if you are searching for a 3 bedroom with en-suite flat. This is a winner.
Great flat, great location, superb host.  Would go back without hesitation.

We traveled with two other couples and this was a great apartment that accommodated everyone’s needs. Plenty of space, nice sized rooms, each with a private bathroom. Location was convenient to tourist attractions and a few minutes walk to the underground. Robert was a wonderful host and very helpful and responsive when needed. I highly recommend this property and would book again!

A very central service apartment, so once you get into the apartment, it gets the job done and I found the space to be uncluttered and relaxing. Amenities are extremely basic given the price point- eg. no soap/shampoo in the bathrooms, only one set of keys for our whole group, and the late or early luggage doesn't really exist. Robert will direct you to a 3rd party service down the street or you may have to awkwardly leave your luggage in the apartment of another Airbnb guest - which is weird for everyone.  So if you are traveling with a group keep in mind that you are paying for the "space" and interacting with an Airbnb handler who is running between all the different listings so keep in mind that coordination time as this is an Airbnb business. I  was traveling with an infant and my inlaws and the check-in process was cumbersome and luggage dropoff dissapointning (just use the 3rd party service from the getgo)  Robert is on the Airbnb messenger and he gives you the mobile number of his Airbnb handler who is running around so you don't want to give him a hard time, but things like an extra set of keys for a 3 bedroom apartment (because you will clearly be a group on different schedules) are basics which are easy to fix .
Amazing location, clean, close to underground, food area and shopping area
Great location

I was very surprised of the title of this listing. I am not a real estate agent, I am a traveler so it doesn’t matter to me if the flat worth £8 million, what matters to me is to stay in a flat fully equipped, especially if I pay £15k / month. I was disappointed to find out that there was a lot of missing essentials: hangers, frying pan, scissors, drying rack (…).
Also, the beds are very, very hard. On the good side, once we mentioned it, we got all of what was missing quickly. The flat is well located, it’s central and convenient and the team that was taking care of the flat : bob and his family, are the best. They were nice and efficient. We got a few complimentary cleanings because we stayed for a month, which is very nice as well.

This is a very spacious flat in a fantastic location. We spent two days shopping, dining and go to the theatre And we were always delighted to get back and relax in the comfort of the flat. Would highly recommend.
Great location, nice flat, spacious bedrooms. Clean and comfortable. We had a problem with noise disturbance from the flat above. Poor soundproofing in an older property.
Super lovely place, suited our requirements to a tee. Super easy to book in with Mary. Bring tea bags and milk.
Clean, spacious, great location, easy check in. Recommended.

The apartment is wonderful! Location is superb, quiet but right in the thick of it, and the apartment is nice, clean and great for a family. Robert is very attentive and easy to access. We’d love to come back!

Fabulous accommodation, great central location.  We dropped luggage off earlier than the official check in time which was helpful.  A secure underground car park is about 5mins walk, Q-Park.  The apartment is very spacious, lovely and clean, the  bathrooms sparkling, shampoo & shower gels provided.  Comfortable beds, luxury linen.  We'll be back without a doubt.  Thank you Robert & team
Everything as described in the heart of London!
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
James is a great host and has a cool little dog called Teddy. Nice clean apartment. Easy to find. Close to a couple different tube stations.
Great place to stay convenient for public transport nice cafes for food nearby, shop across the road. James was great and welcoming and had a nice flat, great place to stay.
James is a great host, i felt at home right away and really enjoyed my time in this space. I highly reccomend him. I look forward to staying here again! Thanks bro. :)
Really enjoyed my time at Jame's place, friendly host, very clean

We stayed at James’s for a long weekend. The stay was amazing. He’s a great guy and very helpful if needed. Place is clean, room is lovely and has everything you may need. His dog is just as a precious added bonus, bless him! We’d definitely do it again!
Thanks so much for the wonderful experience. :)
Easy communication, great location for working around London from.
James's home is queit and near to the undergound station direct to the central line. Jame's dog, teddy, is really friendy and lovely. I really reccomend this place.

James is a very welcoming and friendly host, with both a lovely little flat and a very adorable (and quiet) dog. The room was perfectly comfortable and also surprisingly quiet for London. I'd very happily stay again. Thank you!
Lovely clean space in a easy location to access central London

Great place to stay to visit London, 10 min from tube and close to central line in case you come back late in the night after other tube closes. Would definitely stay here again, car park included is definitely a plus when you visit London!
James’ flat is clean, stylish and centrally located in west London, close to the tube. He replied quickly to my messages. Thanks!
We had a good stay at James’ place. There is everything you need to enjoy your stay with privacy! The flat is also near of the underground/bus which is very practical

I stayed only one night at James' flat but that was enough to realise of the great position of his place in London: the neighborhood is quiet but very well linked with the areas of most interest in London. James was very welcoming and happy to help me to make the most of my time in London. I will defintely book another stay at his when I need! Thank you
Venue was handy to local shops. Ideal for an overnight stay and free parking a bonus.
Sehr empfehlenswert! Gerne wieder. Das Zimmer war sehr sauber und James ist ein netter, angenehmer Künstler! Bis zum nächsten Mal!
James is a friendly and considerate host. The flat is fantastically located near a lovely park and river walks. Great value, comfortable and relaxed. Thoroughly recommended.
He's a good host and his place was really clean!
James is a great host; very friendly, interesting guy with a lovely flat and I felt right at home. Would happily stay again!

各方面都很好，出入交通方便，住宿安全，設備齊全，James非常友善，樂於幫助我們，Teddy也非常乖巧可愛:)
非常感謝James~

Great location, great if you want to park in London. Lovely flat, gorgeous artwork. It was perfect for us as we just needed somewhere to return to after a meal out with friends. James is a fab, welcoming host.
Nice calm and perfect for a short stay
James was really kind and helpful. We just stayed for 2 days. The room was comfortable. Wi-Fi was connected, but internet/data doesn’t work.
All was excellent- comfortable, clean, quiet, and friendly, helpful  host. Thoroughly recommend. Thankyou James. Helen

I can’t reccomend James’ place highly enough!! His flat is located a few seconds from Ravenscourt Park, and about a ten minute walk from Ravenscourt Park tube station. The flat itself is spacious, beautifully decorated and full of light. James keeps the place extremely clean and is a wonderful, friendly host. You’ll have an incredible time for a great price. 10/10 ☺️
Appartement très agréable, bien décoré, lumineux et calme. James est un hôte très gentil. Je le recommande fortement !

James home is very clean, quiet and stress free. He is very welcoming and helpfull. The location is perfectly positioned for easy access to the city centre via public transport and is within walking distance to shops etc.
I am looking forward to my next stay with James on my return visit to london.
Lovely place, friendly host, great location and a huge bonus of parking.

Truly lovely space, filled with interesting art, very stylish and comfortable. The location is good in terms of being very close to shops, transport links, a good few pubs, parks, some cafes and only a short walk to the Thames. Our host was lovely and generous. Our only qualms were that the little dog was not present (we are dog tragics) and that we were not given towels (although we just had to ask for them, so no big deal really)
We had a lovely welcome by James and his dog Teddy. The room was nice and very close to the subway station. We would recommend staying with James while visiting London.
Pokój zgodny z oczekiwaniami. Sympatyczny gospodarz, uroczy pies. Świetna lokalizacja, spokojna okolica. zdecydowanie godne polecenia.

I had a great stay at James’, although I was only there for a night. The apartment is beautiful and very comfortable. It is within a nice area with easy transport to get to other parts of London. James is a wonderful host! I would stay again.

James had a great flat, super arty and unique. We didn't see much of him as we were out most of the day but regardless we felt at home, and his mum made us feel even more comfortable (we ran into her a lot more often and she was lovely!) I would definitely stay with James again, his place was perfect for the two night stay we had.

I stayed at James' place a whole month after I moved to London. It has been a brilliant experience - the place is super stylish, with great art every where, sparkling clean and in a great area with nice cafes around. Needless to say, and his super special companion Teddy, were great hosts. They made my landing in London much smoother than I would have expected.
Great location for where I needed to work, excellent communication from James, who was on hand to welcome me in. Friendly dog and amenities on offer. Enjoyed it.
A comfortable stay. Good location for the centre of London. A friendly host.
James’s place is a lovely space and was perfect for us although we only stayed for one night. Great location, good communication and lovely relaxing room!

James' pad is comfortable, cosy and I loved his colour scheme.  The location was perfect for us for our one night stay.  Access was so easy and James made our self check-in so straight forward.  The place was impeccable and welcoming, and so good to be able to use the kitchen!  Just sorry we kept missing each other!
Friendly host. Excellent location. Clean and tidy accommodation. Highly recommended.
James y Teddy son lo mejor, recomiendo mucho el apartamento
I had a lovely stay as James’s place, it’s a brilliant room with lots of space. Immaculate flat with brilliant artistic flourishes . Great location too.
A cosy place with comfortable bed and the laid-back host.
Great location and value for money. The flat is lovely

James was a truly wonderful host. He was extremely welcoming and helpful to us, and his dog Teddy was lovely company! The room was exactly as pictured and had all the promised amenities, and the rest of his flat was beautifully decorated and cosy too. Aside from being an extremely efficient host, James was friendly and kind, and though our stay was brief, we felt very happy there.
I would definitely recommend him to anyone considering it!
Anna :)

I spent a whole month in his flat. And I feel really lucky it was in his.
The flat is very cosy, very clean, nice decorations.
The room was great, simple and comfortable. And clean!
James is a very welcoming host, happy to talk with you and make you feel comfortable and very empathic so that if you are the kind of guest who rather be left alone he won’t bother you.
I really enjoyed this month and have loved to stay in his flat for longer. I highly recommend this room for everyone.
In terms of location it is right next to Westfield market and close from the center but in a quiet neighbourhood. With some pubs around and supermarket right across the street.

Teddy, his dog, will be your best friend.

Lorenzo
Great place. James is very friendly and easy to talk to. Room and whole apartment better than I expected for the price. His dog Teddy is also great.
James is a very nice guy. We really appreciated his sensibility. We just talked quickly but he gave us good recommandations. We recommand this host.
all good no probs
Clean, tidy, great location and a lovely friendly host.
James is super friendly and an interesting guy to chat to. Comes recommended!

James was a fantastic host. His place was only very neat and clean, and it was a pleasure to see his artworks. The guest bedroom felt really cosy and the mattress was comfortable. Really great value and location - walking distance from a District Line station!
Great stay overall! James was friendly and attentive! Recommended!

James' place is nice. I stayed there for 3 nights and saw James briefly due to his social and work commitments. He was there to welcome me to the flat and I could have rung him if there was a problem. Basically, had the place to myself more or less!
Great! Exactly as described!

James’ apartment is even nicer than it seems to be in the pictures. Clean and cozy and it’s very easy to get to places from there either by bus or tube and, of course, his dog will make the experience even better! I had a great weekend in London and felt super sad during my checkout sooo it looks like I definitely recommend his place :)
James is an excellent host. Good facilities and location. My third stay with James!

The place is clean and tidy. Location wise, there are busses nearby connecting to metro stations and other hot places in London. Also there is a grocery store nearby which is convenient. This place is worth the money. I recommend this place.
We had a great time at James' place. It is an ideal location, just a short bus ride into central London. Very comfortable and full of super art. James is fascinating to talk to .

We really enjoyed our stay at James’ place! He was very friendly, easygoing and we had some great conversations. The bed was very comfortable and the apartment was a quick walk from a bus stop w buses heading towards Central London. James was able to accommodate us with our check in/out times which we greatly appreciated. Would defiantly recommend this place! Thanks

Very lovely stay and communication with our host who made us feel very welcome in his cosy artistic and beautiful flat, wonderful location, close to local amenities and shopping centre! Definitely recommend!! :) Thank you!
This is a lovely place to stay - easy to find and great host. It worked perfectly for me as I was going to a gig in Shepherd's Bush. So a great location too.

My experience with the booking was very bad.! The property was occupied by someone when I get there and the occupant told me the property already rented to her. I recommend doing your checking to make sure the room is available before you get there if the room is still available in AirBnB.
I had a lovely time at James’ place. I didn’t have much time to enjoy as I was out most of the day but was a cozy and clean place to come home to.
Thank you for being a wonderful host!
Absolutely amazing. I really loved everything! It has a perfect location for traveler. The place is very cozy and comfortable, just incredible. I would highly recommend.
房主是一位很nice的漂亮小姐姐，人很好很体贴，在出发去英国前会告诉我伦敦当地的天气,解答了我很多问题。房子很干净，装修很时尚，地处市中心，出行很方便，靠近海德公园，周边环境很好。下次来英国还会选择的。

"There is no place like home" until we arrived to Sophie and Sharon's apartment. They truly made us feel welcome and comfortable. Their house is close to the center of London. And we had such a wonderful experience
Lovely private room with good light. Private bath. Sweet pets. Lovely hosts. Thank you!

Sophie and Sharon's apartment is really cosy and comfortable. Their house is on the edge of Hyde park and close to the center of London. Private bathroom, lovely pets, useful suggestions, we had such a wonderful experience and we will come back next time.
very pleasant room. Sophie is a very nice person very smiling and super nice. I recommend this rental.

We stay three days by Sophie’s home she is so kind and polite... her house is very nice and clean so ad the room and privite Bath . All is perfect ! The house is very close to bus and tube station all destinations are very easy to get . We love our stay to Sophie’s home most of all we left our heart to the small dog Jeremy he is so sweet

Sophie is a five stars host
She was there to welcome us
The place was really clean and they have lovely tiny pets
Even if we were late for the check out, Sophie was really nice to us !
I recommend this place !
Thank you !

My husband and I had a lovely stay with Sophie and Sharon. The room was clean, quiet and comfortable. Great location from which to explore London, easily accessible to multiple tube lines and lovely morning walks in Hyde Park. Most of all, we loved hanging out with the little dog Jeremy, who was also a great host!

They were very friendly and hospitable! They had visiting tips for us and they offered us water and beer, and even spicy shrimps from their late dinner. We had nice discussions with them. The room and apartment was clean and location is great. In the clean bathroom, soaps and body washs were offered. We loved the pets, Jeremy the dog and Chris the cat. There was only little poop, but that 's what you need to prepare with animals and it disappeared quite quickly, and didn't bother us. There is nothing to complain about and we had great time and comfortable visit. I do recommend this place for anyone who endures or likes pets!

We enjoyed our stay very much at Sophie’s place. It was immaculate and exactly like the pictures. The daybed folded out into a wide and comfy double bed that fit the two of us with room to spare. It was also really nice having a towel heater - warm and dry towels! Jeremy the puppy was super friendly and a great host too! Great location - buses and the underground connects you everywhere. Highly recommended!

When we arrived at Sophie’s , we were a bit late and despite of that she was happy to help us out and took late check in. We found place clean and tidy. Pets are nice  Sophie was very social and took everything with smile. I suggest to book this place for weekend travel, as it is close to all restaurants, bars , public transport and popular London sights and attractions.
진짜 완벽그자체입니다. 1~2명의 방문자에게 추천하구요, 진짜깨끗했습니다. 강아지와고양이도 귀여웠고 낯가리지않았구요. 화장실도 호스트만사용하는화장실이라 좋고 도보로 2분거리에 하이드파크있어서 좋아용♡ 저희는 거의다 도보로만 다녔고 런던아이에서 여기까지 1시간정도 둘러보면서 걸으면 옵니다!! 답변도빠르구요!! 런던에서  머무신다면 추천♡♡♡
Sophie es una chica responsable ,puntual,amable y se interesa por si todo está ok ,el metro a dos minutos y zona céntrica ,mejor imposible ,lo recomiendo
Nice, clean room and bathroom, fantastic location and the nicest host! We will definately book this place next time we visit London:)
Sophie was very kind and easy to get in touch with. The room was a bit small, but comfortable for 2 adults with all lur luggage! And such a beautiful area!!
What a truly wonderful Airbnb! We had a great stay here, super close to highlights and public transport

Pros:
-She was nice enough to let us check in early since our flight got in early - very nice of her - as well as said we could check out later than the time we were supposed to!
- quiet neighborhood and very close to Hyde park
-grab dinner/breakfast at The Swan- very close to her place! Awesome pub!
-the room was clean and exactly as she described!
-her pets were really sweet! The dog, Jeremy was such a love bug!!

Cons:
- first night she had a friend over and were pretty loud and kept waking us up in the night by them laughing and talking. She apologized for this the next morning. (Second night was very quiet).
- wish she had moved the litter box out of our bathroom.
-the room is extremely small when you pull the bed out, wouldn’t recommend staying here for long periods or if you plan to be at her place for hours on end ... although - you’re in London, so why would you be!

Very nice host, would recommend her to anyone that’s comfortable staying at an Airbnb that doesn’t mind sharing living space with the owner!

Sophie IS really a SUPERHOST ! She and Sharon are very nice persons, very attentionate and have a great appartment situated in a very quiet neighbourhood, so quiet that with the heat we left the windows open every night without any trouble. We will most surely stay again at their place for our next visit to London.
Fantastic place to stay in the heart of London! Great value, great host and adorable welcoming party in the form of Sophie’s dog and cat :) Hope to stay again when I’m next in London!

Sophie and Sharon are very nice and friendly hosts. The apartment is well located in central London and has easy access to everything. I would always come back and highly recommend their place to everyone!

3 reasons why you should stay at Sophie's place:

1. GREAT location- Close to Paddington and Lancaster Gate stations, with many food options and supermarkets available nearby. Paddington is also super close to Heathrow. Took me 15 mins to get to Heathrow for my flight.

2. FRIENDLY hosts- Sophie and Sharon are such kind and gracious hosts. They are very caring and I felt right at home at their place :)

3. SWEETEST pets- Chris and Jeremy are such wonderful companions! We bonded quickly and I thoroughly enjoyed their company. They are sweet and gentle creatures.

Overall, my stay at Sophie's was such a homely experience. Will recommend to anyone looking for a clean, comfortable and convenient place to stay in.

Thanks Sophie and Sharon! <3

Sophie and Sharon (And Chris and Jerry) are super friendly. If there was a problem or question they helped us immediately.
We were able to use everything and eat on their dining table. It was never too loud and they let us our privacy when they also were at home.
Chris (the cat) and Jerry (the dog) are super nice animals which were really calm.
The flat was really nice located. The Hyde Park is 3 minutes away and the next underground 5 minutes. But there was no traffic noise.
We had such a great time and would love to come back!

Excellent apartment near Hyde Park, only 2 minutes walking.
It’s exactly like the photos with the cat and the dog.
Sophie and Sharon were friendly and flexible with the check-in and check-out.

Very good place in Sophie’s flat, near Hyde Park, Nothing Hill and Oxford street. Very easy to move by Bus or Subway in London. Everything was very clean, accessible and the animals (Jerry & Chris) were lovely. Thanks for everything and see you next time maybe.

Sophie’s apparemment is the best value you can have in London! The location is amazing (10min walk from the Lancaster Gate station (central line) and 5min from Hyde Park). From there you easily go every where in London in no time (Notting Hill is one stop away and Oxford Street is only 4)! The place is super cosy and clean. The private bedroom was very nice and fully equipped. I really felt like I was at home. Sophie, her friends are super friendly and her pets are very quiet. I specially appreciated the fact that Sophie’s agreed with early and late checkin/checkout to match the train arrival and departure time. I will definitely go back there next time I go to London!

Had a wonderful experience at Sophie and Sharon’s place. They were a great hosts. We had a long chat despite them coming back home late from work. Spent quite alot of time with Jeremy (dog) and Chris (cat) too. They were so friendly and cute!

Its near and easy to reach from Lancester Gate train station and bus stops. It is also right beside Hyde Park which is beautiful.

The apartment is very clean even with 2 fur babies around. We would definitely want to go to Sophie and Sharon’s home again the next time we visit London :)

유럽에와 처음 머물었는데 접근성도 좋고 집도 깨해끗하고 모두 좋았습니다.^^
특히 강아지랑 고양이가 너무 귀여워서 보고싶네요. 짧은 기간동안 감사했습니다.
it is a lovely flat, a great host, friendly and helpful. If you are a pet lover this place will make you feel like home. It is very clean. I think it' s value is awesome.
숙소 근처에 언더그라운드, 버스정류장이 다 가깝게 있어요. 좋았습니다!

Advantage
- Great location. Close to busstop, underground, Paddington station to the airport.
- It's a safe area because there are many hotels around.
- And the puppy and cat very cute. I love them.
- The room is quiet around the house and warm even in cold weather.
- The room is very clean.
- The toilet was clean, hot water came out well, and the water pressure was strong.

Weeknees
- I thought there was only one host, but there were two people.
- The sound of conversation and TV was a little loud at night.
- I didn't like to wake up every morning smelling cat poop at the door, but I didn't mind leaving early.

Overall, A well-furnished house.
It is a good place to come alone, and if I can come back to London, I would like to come again.

The apartment is extremely comfortable, clean, and had everything we needed to have an excellent stay in London. It’s also really well-located, close to buses, underground stations, restaurants, markets and several attractions. Sophie and Sharon were very kind and helpful. It couldn’t have been better!
Excellent location, great host.

Absolutely loved the convenient location of Sophie's place. It's about a 7 minute walk to Lancaster Gate, Bayswater, and Queensway stations which link you to a lot of direct train lines to see all the major sights in London. The room is quite small but very cosy, love the pressure of the shower. Please note that their cat has diabetes so you will wake up to a one or more pee spots in the apartment. Wasn't a problem for us because we love animals and really enjoyed playing and cuddling with their chihuahua and cat! Thanks Sophie!

Hermoso departamento, en un barrio muy lindo, típico depto inglés. Cerca de varias líneas de subte, a una cuadra del Hyde Park. Se observa que Sophie está en todos los detalles para que su casa sea muy cómoda. Jerry y Chris inmejorable compañía para los que extrañamos a nuestras mascotas en los viajes. Muy limpio y cálido todo. Saludos!

Next to Hyde Park, this flat is located at a high end community. Every corner of the flat is clean.

Sophie is very easy to communicate with. A very decent lady. I would love to share more thought with her.

As a pet lover, I really like to play with Chris and Jerry.

Oh. The coffee is wonderful!

The nearby Queensway station has many affordable restaurants.

Hôte très chaleureuse. Bien accueillie, animaux gentils et accueillants. Localisation idéale et quartier chic ainsi qu’apaisant. Chambre un peu petite. Nous pensions avoir accès à l’appartement en entier mais qu’une chambre avec une salle de bain.

The room was really clean and easy access to the flat, the only thing is there is a smell in the common area/ bathroom due to the cat but the room doesn’t smell. Their dog is super friendly and they’re not loud hosts but chill overall. Even though the bed is a pullout it’s really big and comfortable, enough for 2 people.

Sophie's place was absolutely perfect! The flat was exactly as described and the little touches were very thoughtful.
The place is beautiful and very well located (seconds from Hyde Park & a few minutes to the Tube Station) and easy to get everywhere in London.
They have the 2 cutest dogs and cat and we could not get enough of them.
Overall, the place is perfect and the hosts are wonderful - I highly recommend Sophie's place!!
Exatamente como o anúncio! Tivemos uma ótima estadia, localização privilegiada.

整间屋子干净整洁，床打开之后很大呢，睡得很舒服！厨房有微波炉冰箱咖啡机都可以用，两位美女房东也很健谈，感觉棒棒哒，尤其三只小可爱，一回到家了就围上来，感觉自己人生已经到达了巅峰，哈哈哈哈哈哈！下次来伦敦还会预定你家，笔芯！
Sophie is the best host possible. Her flat is well-located, very clean, the communication was great and her two dogs and cat are very cute. I 100% recommend!

Sophie's apartment is perfect in any aspect (location, cleaning..)!
We loved Sophie and Sharon hospitality.
If you love pets this is the right place: Chris ( the cat) , Jeremy and Coco ( the dogs) are adorable!!
We recommend this place!

We had a really great stay at Sophia's place in the Kensington area! The location was fantastic, in a beautiful area that was very close to an underground station and Hyde Park/Kensington Gardens. The apartment was very comfortable and quiet, making for a great base to explore central London. Sophia and Sharon were really good hosts, making check-in very easy and regularly responding to any messages we had. Jeremy, Chris and Coco were very quiet and friendly animals and are incredibly cute; we looked forward to seeing them in the morning! All up, we would recommend staying here!

The place is just exactly like how Sophie described it, it was clean and comfortable. The room is bright but it's quite small if you have big suitcases. Chris, Jeremy and Coco are sweet pets, they won't bother you. Location wise was perfect, nearby beautiful Hyde park, and walkable distance to underground station. Overall we enjoyed the stay in Sophie's place. Thank you

Nice tiny room in the heart of London. The apartment is close to the London city center, subway and bus stop. Sofia lives with her small friends and if you have no allergies that would bring your stay to another level.

This is a great AirBnB. I’m always a bit hesitant to stay in shared spaces, but staying with Sophie was wonderful. The space was as promised and her pets are adorable! The location is fabulous with easy access to amazing restaurants, coffee shops and the tube. My husband and I were able to get around fairly easily from here as London novices and it didn’t hurt that this area of London is wonderfully picturesque. We enjoyed our stay.

Nice and warm welcome of Beth! Nice value for the money. Extra Attention could be given when cleaning the room, but global experience is acceptable.
Great space and host. Real easy access to the rest of London

Is a flat very well located to know London, very comfortable and beautiful. relationship quality price very good

Beth’s place was lovely and well located. Our hosts were kind, informative, and welcoming, and made us feel right at home!

Dan & Beth are lovely, as their flat. They gave us a lot of small present and food.
Near the city center and in a beautiful place, I recommend without hesitation !

Beth and Dan apartment's is very cool, near from bus stop. Perfect to easily move by bus to London.

A fantastic place to enjoy and explore Rotherhithe and the Thames path. A lovely flat with incredible views. Highly recommended!

Gianni was the perfect host and one of the best people i've met in my entire life. He was so full of kindness and helped us with everything we neededm including setting up an extra bed and duvets. I would recommend Gianni's place in a heartbeat to anyone visiting london!

Great location. Close to underground and supermarkets.

The flat was a perfect fit our our family of 5.  It was clean, had plenty of towels, well equipped.  The stylish touches like scented oils and decor were welcoming. Corrine was very helpful and clear in explaining the details of the flat and the areas surrounding.  It is close to 2 underground stations:  Bayswater & Queensway so it was easy to get to the center of the city and back.  The is also a hop on & off stop near  Hyde Park.  The park is beautiful and makes for a nice walk in the morning or afternoon.  There are shops, restaurants and a nice coffee shop (Granier's) on the next block over from the flat.  There is a friendly & helpful porter for the building who is there during the week.  The flat is secure and has a lift.  Thank you Gianni & Corrine for making our first trip to London a great one!!

Recomiendo 100 ,%  excelente lugar en todos los sentidos , cuenta con calefacción tipo central , agua bien caliente y con potencia ! Gianni was diligent to reach out to us through out our stay in London.  He met us early, and was very courteous.  Since the room was ready in the morning, we were able to gain early entry.  The place was very clean and a quick walk to Kennsington and Hyde Parks and the Tube, which is the main reason we chose the apartment.  The apartment had comfortable beds and plenty of hot water.  We had an enjoyable experience and would stay again.

For a Malaysian and muslim, the location was why we chose the place. Convenient to move around, close to Hyde Park And the Public Transport.
The place was clean and spacious.

Gianni and his team quick to answer queries. The reception man downstairs was really friendly and nice.

Enjoyed the stay

Clean, warm, safe, cosy and spacious! Huge, comfortable super king size bed. Not to mention an ideal location for exploring Hyde Park, Kensington Palace, The Natural History Museum and Portabello Market, all within walking distance, as was our show at the Royal Albert Hall. Thanks for a lovely stay!

Wonderful apartment, clean, spacious, everything new.
Great location. Quiet, close to the tube, restaurants and supermarkets.
Gianni is a very good host!
Anita is a great host. good value for money. Clean and tidy. 5 mins walk for tube, 20 mins central London. Plenty of local amenities in Kilburn high street. highly recommend.

Tom's place is a wonderful find: immaculately clean, quiet, private, comfortable and convenient. Great neighborhood with excellent access to public transport. The two bedrooms/bathrooms worked very well to share with two relatives, would be fine with three as well. The sunken bathroom is really fun! There were nice amenities and the agency was terrific to work with for arrangements including check-in and check-out. We arrived late from an overseas flight and they went out of their way to take care of us. We'll be back!
preis-leistung ist sehr gut

Amazing small town to be in. There is a local pub one bus stop away to the west where everyone knows everyone. The local farmers market is on Wednesday’s, Friday’s, and Saturday’s. The selection of goods is enormous besides the typical farmer goods. The market is a few bus stops away from the flat.

In addition, the market is part of the Liberty Shopping Center, so excellent proximity to local businesses. There is a movie theater part of it to boot.

Cheng’s room comes with a keyed lock, so your belongings are safe.

Cheng is very polite and his hospitality is warm and welcoming. His wife is a fun person to talk to and equally as polite and hospitable.
Lovely family and great hospitality, was a pleasure to stay in there home.
Very friendly host and excellent communication. Cheng was very kind and offer me a lift to a nearby venue where I was attending a wedding. Good value for money.

Wonderful stay at Bin's place! Very fast responses to my requests by Bin. The place is located in central London and is perfect for travel!

Es un lugar amplio e ideal para grupos numerosos (tiene varios cuartos y camas). Buena opción para llegar a dormir no tanto para pasar el día en él.  Bin es un buen anfitrión y responde casi de forma inmediata a cualquier pregunta o comentario.

The communication with Bin is very nice and quick. All requests were answered within minutes, which made the planning of the trip very easy. The appartment is perfectly located for a short trip.
Unfortunately, the appartment was partly very dirty, especially the toilet and the shower. Both looked like it hadn‘t been cleaned for a while. The flushing didn‘t work at all. We were staying in Bin‘s appartment with four people for one night. We shared the rooms and the sanitary facilities. A functioning toilet is basically one of the most important things people need in a house, no matter how long the stay is. As for the shower, we had the feeling, as if we were sharing it with a bunch of people who were staying there before.

Cet appartement est très bien situé, 15 min à pied de Covent Garden 20min de piccadilly.
L'appartement a 4 grandes chambres et très confortable literie. Cet appartement est bien pour dormir mais pas y rester la journée.
L'accueil par Bin a été très bien, nous sommes arrivés à l'appartement à l'heure qui nous convenait.

I like staying at Bin’s place. The location is great, only takes 5 mins walking to tube station and so many coffee shop nearby. Also, the wifi device was great speed. Thanks, Bin!

This was a cute little self contained flat in a very good location. As it’s on a main road, it was very loud with the windows open. They did provide a fan though, so sleeping with the windows closed was a fine option

This is a great space to be connected to all things central London! Best if you don't mind city sounds as there are bars and a busy train station quite close. Silvia is really great at communicating and getting everything set up! Highly recommend this apartment!

Marta was an excellent host. She responded quickly to my messages and made me feel right at home. Her flat is very bright and cozy. It is also located right next to the Camden markets and a walkable distance from the city center. I would highly recommend Marta and her lovely flat for any solo traveler visiting London.

Marta was the perfect host! Very welcoming and ensured that every little thing had been thought of -nothing was too much trouble for her! The place was clean and handily located near to Kings cross. Would happily book to stay here again in the future!

Ruth and her family are very nice and friendly people. We had a great time in London and were very happy to stay at Ruth's place. A communication with her was very good and the flat was exactly like in the description and pictures, just a few minutes from Ealing Broadway station. I recommend!

Great place with a warm friendly family. Room was large with a nice size desk. A very quite location but only 5 mins walk to underground station. Plenty of shops close by including a Wetherspoons 2 mins walk so ideal for breakfast.

All good Ruth is a good host clean and comfortable room wld recommend this place any time x

Ruth's place is amazing.
I have been traveling for 2 weeks. This is my last stop and yet most comfortable place. This is we call feel-at-home.

Before checking-in, Ruth approached me in advance with every details even a photo guide of how to find the building. Even though there are 45E/45C in the same building.

After checked-in, I found the bed really comfortable, I also got a free bottle of water, one body gel.

Then you have full access to the Kitchen.

This place is close to Heathrow airport, but I can't hear any airplanes all day.
Just 200 meters to Ealing broadway Metro station. You have many food stores with walking distance.

The communication with Ruth had been really a pleasure.
Highly recommend for other tourists.
Ruth’s place is in an excellent location near to all amenities and transportation.  Her place is very clean and she was very helpful always there to answer questions. It was a pleasure to meet her.

Ruth & Alex place is located in a very convenient place to reach the center of London, it's a very nice area to live and to rest after a day exploring the city. They are very kind and it's easy to feel at home in their place. The home is sparkling clean and the common space are fully equipped. I definitely recommend their place for your trip in London.
We had a lovely stay here and the flat is in a great location and very well kept.

This is a lovely modern self contained apartment in Kensington. It was very clean and had everything you need for a comfortable stay. Lucinda was a great host, she responded quickly to messages and made us feel very welcome. We will definitely stay again when we travel to London in the future.

Lucinda was an amazing host , helpful , kind and made us feel safe and at home .
Her apartment is modern , clean , cozy and handy to the train stations and shops . We would stay there again in a heart beat ! The best experience of an air bnb . Thank you Lucinda you were fabulous and we thank you so much for caring about making our stay fabulous .
Lucinda’s flat is absolutely incredible the neighborhood is impeccable extremely close to public transportation very easy to access extremely clean easy communication. 100% recommend staying here
This is a charming, sparkling clean, well-appointed one bedroom flat in the heart of Chelsea. The hostess is very well-organized and ensured seamless logistics. Highly recommended!

I stayed two nights at Lucinda’s small but efficient apartment in fashionable upscale Chelsea, London.

The flat would be perfect for not more than two guests. It looked as if it has been recently refurbished with new wooden floors, spanking clean bathroom (with a rain shower!).

The flat also gives access to a courtyard where one can sit down for a bit of fresh air. The flat is airy and bright.

The best thing about the flat is that it is between two main roads, Brompton Rd and King’s Rd, both lined with stylish shops, cafes and restaurants yet the property was tucked at the end of a very short quiet street.

Checking-in was a breeze and same with checking out.

While it might not be ideal for a first-time tourist/visitor to London but it is fantastic for someone who would like to enjoy London in an upscale location and having and fuss-free and kindly host.

The apartment is cosy, clean, well-equiped, well-furnished... and perfectly located to visit London. We fell in love with Chelsea, it's a really cute and lovely village. Lucinda is a great host, full of attention, reactive, and willing to share tips about her district. We would come back with pleasure !
Lovely private street, very quiet, very clean, very helpful host

Lucinda is a fantastic host. The flat is spotless and a great place to stay in London. It is light and airy and beautifully furnished.
The location could not have been better. The flat is very close to the tube station and also served by many bus routes. Chelsea Green has lovely little shops and the King’s Road is a two minute walk from the flat. The museums are just over ten minutes walk away.
I will certainly be returning. This flat could not be more perfect for a stay in London.
Lucinda's place was ideally located, in a quiet cul de sac, and very close to all amenities. Very happy with the stay  would recommend.
Lucinda’s place was wonderful. The neighborhood and overall location were great, and our stay was very pleasant.
Great position and easy access
Good for one person.. size of bathroom might be an issue for two persons.

Centrally located flat in Chelsea - fantastic spot to see the sights. We stayed two nights here and couldn't have been more pleased. The flat is a five minute walk to the nearest tube station which will put you on the Circle or District lines that take you straight down into central London. Grocery store and bank are about a block away. Neighborhood was extremely safe and very quiet at night. The flat itself was the perfect size for the two of us - comfortable bed, fast wifi, and a full kitchen. Lucinda was flexible with us on check-in which really helped! Would stay here again!
All perfect
s
Easy, comfortable and an excellent location.
Great place, very easy check in, perfect location

Lucinda’s apartment is the best place to stay in London. The Chelsea neighborhood is safe and the apartment is conveniently located near the South Kensington Underground station. Lucinda’s hospitality is top notch and shes always there to help you if needed. Would highly recommend staying at her apartment if you are first timers in London!
Great place and great host as always
Great place, everything from the flat to the location to the owner.
Lovely place and fantastic host!

Lucinda’s home is one of the nicest Airbnb’s I have ever experienced. She goes above and beyond to make sure her guests are welcomed, and cared for. Her location cannot be beat.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and most certainly will come back to 13 Guthrie Street when we are next in London.

Lucinda was a very nice and efficient host. The apartment is quiet and conveniently located just a few blocks from the subway station of South Kensington. The apartment is clean and newly renovated. At my arrival there was a small problem in the bathroom (a broken piece of the toilet seat), but Lucinda immediately called the plumber and fixed it. Everything else was perfect. I definitely recommend Lucinda's apartment and would consider to return there again.
Another lovely stay in Lucinda’s apartment, I have no doubt we will return

Lucinda's apartment is very lovely and in a great quiet location! It is a basement unit and she lives right above and is available to answer any questions. She was very accommodating and available. The location is near a lot of nice shops and about a 10 minute walk from the tube station. It was nice to experience Chelsea like a local!

Great location. Perfect for two people. Looked even cuter in person. Check-in was so easy, as was check-out. Met Lucinda upon checking out and she was just as wonderful in person as she was in messages. Would highly recommend!
给中国朋友方便就打中文吧。房子很好。有客厅  就是地下的下楼梯拿行李箱不方便 房东也很好。反正我觉得挺好的 还想多住可是日期订出去了

This is a fabulous basement flat in a very quiet & interesting area of London. It is a gentle ten minute walk from South Kensington tube and there are lots of places to shop, eat & explore within easy walking distance. Royal Brompton & Marsden Hospitals are just around the corner.
The flat is accessed down quite narrow metal steps and there is a key safe so it’s very easy to check in....we were lucky to have Lucinda meet us & show us round. There are two rooms, one with a complete kitchen, dining table & chairs, tv and a very comfy sofa. The bedroom has plenty of storage, comfy double bed and en suite with shower & loads of hot water. There is under floor heating and toiletries, towels tea, coffee etc are provided.
We went to see a couple of west end shows and it’s really easy to get there & back on just one tube. We would definitely stay again on future visits and recommend to anyone looking for good accommodation in this lovely area.
房东超级友好 还来Harrods陪我逛街 就像朋友一样  她女儿也十分可爱 一家人都会给你亲切的感觉  地理位置非常好  离harrods非常近   打伦敦black taxi 才6磅。走路五分钟就可以到网红餐厅The lvy chlesea garden restaurant  如果你要找安静 宽敞的房子 这家就对了  绝对的独享一个客房跟客厅 和卫生间  如果可以 真想租上一个月

Great stay and Lucinda was an exceptional host. Will definitely be using this as a base for business or pleasure. Location is great but tucked away from all of the London noise.
Would definitely recommend without any hesitation

what an amazing stay we had with Lucinda, perfect host, lovely apartment with everything one needs and more and a host that is super friendly, accommodating and will go the extra mile to make your stay a happy one. will definitely stay with you again Lucinda

Second stay and once again a great stay.
This is an excellent location if needing Royal Marsden Hospital or doing the tourist thing of visiting museums.
Perfect. Fabulous flat. Great location. Wonderful hostess. Couldn't have been any better.

This flat is super such as nice host, location, clean, quiet, etc.
I will stay at my next visit again.

Lucinda's place is amazing, the neighborhood is gorgeous, the place is very quiet, the location is great it is a 10 minute walk from the Tube, a 2 minute walk to the bike station. The aparment is well equiped,  cozy and comfortable. It is the perfect mix between price and benefits.  Lucinda is very friendly and she was available to any question that I had. I would love to stay at this place for my next time in London.
We loved our stay at Lucinda's place!  Wish we could have stayed longer!

A lovely little spot in a surprisingly tranquil area of London. Fantastic travel links and close lroximity to shops/pubs etc. Lucinda was very quick with all responses and flexible with bag drop off. Would highly recommend.
Very attractive flat and ideally located in Chelsea.  Near good restaurants and shops.
Fantastic host, very thoughtful and flat was lovely. Nice area with lots off amenities close by.

The flat was maybe better than expected!

The location is a premium choice as the neighborhood is very very quiet, absolutely charming and very easy and quick access to the city center main activities from south Kensington station.

The apartment has all the equipments you may need and was the cleanest flat i have ever booked.

We were very lucky to get this beautiful self-contained flat for our first New Year’s Eve in London.
This place is lovely, clean, great location. And Lucinda was really nice and helpful and responded very quickly.
Excellent , comfortable place with delightful host. Highly recommend.

Lucinda's place was great! It was perfect for the two of us for the weekend. She left cute little snacks, the place was very clean, and check in was the easiest I've experienced.  Very grateful for the wonderful accommodation which made our trip to London a breeze.
Lovely apartment in a great location. Fantastic host and great communication.

Lucinda very rightly has a super host tag, the property is super too. Some guests aren’t used to central London properties. This may be a mews basement ( I have stayed in a few) but it is the best quality I have stayed in. Lovely fittings, best quality towels and spitlessly clean. Highly recommend and as i’m in the area on business a lot I will return asap

This is a most magnificent basement flat with the owners living above.  There are some steep stairs going down which might be a put off for less mobile people but this is really typical of London.  I was there for business purposes and it was such a better option than a hotel.  The decor is modern with warm underfloor heating. Super comfortable bed and I got a great night sleep. Lucinda is a great host and very welcoming.  Fast Internet.  Just can't fault it.
Really great location in a very quiet cull de sac. Property was exactly as described, all very good. Communication with Lucinda was excellent, can’t ask for more!
One of the nicest places in west London, location and price wise. Highly recommend!
A very nice little underground flat.  Comfortable and quite.
A fantastic spot for a work or holiday trip to London. Would highly recommend on every level.
Very comfortable, great size - have often paid more in Chelsea for a place with much less space. Not any less comfortable than a hotel room.
Great location and everything you could need in a flat.  Very clean and stylish.  Would definitely stay at this flat again.
This is a really fantastic home from home, with lots of thoughtful touches in a brilliant location.  Highly recommend!!
Fab place lovely stylish. Great host

This flat was perfect for my visit to London! Exactly as described! Great location-8 minute walk to the underground, great restaurants and shops close by and such a charming neighborhood! The place is small but was perfect for me and my husband. Lucinda accommodated an early check-in and was there to meet us. Great host, great place! Would definitely stay here again!

Lucinda is a very gracious, warm and helpful host who responds quickly to any questions. Although we were several hours late, Lucinda was there to meet us and show us around the flat.
Lucinda's flat is very clean, well equipped and quiet.
The flat is in a great location in Chelsea, an easy 8 minute walk to South Kensington tube station.
The flat is an easy 13 minute walk to the Victoria and Albert Museum and The Natural History Museum.
The King's Road is also handy for excellent food, clothing and Sloane Square tube station.
Waitrose supermarket on the King's road is also a short walk away.
We had a lovely eleven day stay at Lucinda's and would not hesitate in coming back to stay.
Lovely apartment in a fantastic neighborhood. Lucinda was very responsive and helpful. I would definitely stay there again

We stayed six nights in this clean, comfortable flat and appreciated the great location in a nice neighborhood, so close to the Tube stop.  Lucinda is a great host--very responsive and helpful.  We would definitely stay here again!

We had a great time at this cute spot in Chelsea! Lucinda is a warm and welcoming person and very helpful with local recommendations etc. The Airbnb is stylish, very clean, and had everything we needed. The location could not be better! We would gladly stay again.
Lovely place nice and quiet.
Perfect flat in ideal location

This is such a lovely underground flat, place is super clean and tidy, bed is very comfortable, host is super kind and sweet, she carried my luggage for me and i was so impressed, anything you ask the host reply very very quickly, the location is fantastic, easy to get to kings road, the museum, the tube, strong recommended

Lovely quiet flat in an ideal location for exploring London. Close to the underground , good restaurants , museums , art galleries and shops.
We appreciated the snacks and breakfast cereal.
Lucinda is a very personable host and made us feel very welcome.

A stylish stay so close to exhibition road and Hyde park. The property was in a very quiet location and was super clean with thoughtful little extras like dressing gowns and porridge. Would definitely stay again.

Unbelievable place. From checking in to checking could not have been better.
Cleanliness, comfort, location and just everything you could want to hand. The little outside seating area in a wonderful addition. Lucinda will do her best to accommodate all your requirements.
I slept like I was would have at ‘home’. Felt safe and secure., as a single female travelling on my own for the first time.What more can I say.
Thank you Lucinda.

Perfect location in chelsea, clean and comfortable place! Strongly recommend!

Lucinda's place is a relaxing place to stay in the heart of the city

Lovely spotlessly clean apartment in the heart of Chelsea.
I highly recommend Lucinda's apartment, clean comfortable and well equipped for a delightful stay.

Ich reise sehr viel mit air b&b
Diese Unterkunft war aber die schönste für mich. Lucinda, war eine tolle Gastgeberin. Die Lage ist für London perfekt. Ruhige Gasse/ total zentral. Schöne Wohngegend. UBahn in der Nähe.
Zum Essen empfehlen wir Tom‘s kitchen
