La ubicación es genial, y la limpieza estaba bien. La relación calidad precio buena... lo malo que llegamos a las 12 de la noche y la casa estaba gelida. Hubiese estado bien que la calentasen un poco antes de llegar

Everything that you would expect from a flat in heart of Camden.
Overall we had a very nice stay. The host was very communicative, professional and helpful.

Très bon séjour chez Iwona. Appartement conforme à l'annonce. Proche du métro de camden town. Restaurants et commerce à proximités
La chambre donnant sur la rue est un peu bruyante la nuit, mais c'est le prix à payer pour être proche de l’animation, par contre celle sur cour est parfaite, aucun bruit.
Si nous retournons à Londres nous retournerons à cette adresse.
Convenient location, and enough space for family.

I was so excited for our stay in London.  Unfortunately our stay in this airbnb fell extremely short. Our first night we had no tv and the linens for the sofa bed were unclean and stained. The toilet seat was falling off and if you wanted to have a glass of wine - there was no corkscrew or wine glasses. Also forget about coffee as there is no coffee pot either. in addition you cannot cook anything even though there is a kitchen because there were no kitchen utensils. The main area is very cramped and small and would not accomodate 6 as the listing advertises. We were very tight with 4 and had to keep moving the furniture to get to the refrigerator.  Overall a very disappointing rental.

This flat is wonderfully located but minimally equipped and extremely functional rather than cozy or cared for. We loved being in town​ but would have appreciated more comforts and a more responsive host.
Logement spacieux grandes chambres , très bien situé pour explorer Londres .

Emplacement idéalement situé.
Appartement charmant et bien agencé.
Une des deux chambres est particulièrement grande.
Iwona répond rapidement à nos questions et très arrangeante.
Nous recommandons.

The unit has a modern touch & its wonderfully located at the heart of Camden Town! We had easy access to the tube station, food restaurants, Tesco, Sainsbury & many more other places. We loved staying here esp my kids & aunties! This place is highly recommended for future travellers!
Great location in Camden! You have everything you need just outside the door and with the underground easily available you can go anywhere within minutes!
This apartment is in a great location in funky Camden Town, London.
Great location, close to the tube, plentiful restaurant selection, very convenient.
unclean house. toilet stink. bathroom has a wood side. bed covers had hairs. very noisy at friday and saturday night. i send message to owner about tv and reply after 5 days
Situation géographique exceptionnelle, appartement agréable. L'organisation de Iwona est parfaite.
Dejligt kvarter i London. God lejlighed, men noget larm fra gaden. Rigtig god beliggenhed og nemt at komme ind. Gode faciliteter.

The flat was spotless when we walked in after a very easy check in. Location is amazing . A minor issue was dealt with promptly.  A fabulous stay - we would definitely use again on our next visit to London. Thank you so much!
Great flat with lots of space and amenities in a well connected area. Thank you for a great stay.

Had a great time. I love the hustle and bustle of Camden so this was perfect for us. It is on a main road so the front bedroom can be loud at night (so bring earplugs) but the second bedroom at the back was perfectly quiet. I would definitely stay here again.

Great place and excellent communication x

Great location in Camden! Underground, supermarkets and restaurants are all within super close range of 5 min walk.
Apartment is rather practical than cozy. Bed room on street side is super noisy, so definitely bring earplugs if you want a good night‘s sleep.

The accomodation was very nice and the location was unbelievable. We were very close to the Camden Town Station, Whole Foods was right next door and there were lots of nice restaurants. The stairs can be a bit of a challenge if you have lot of luggage but we loved it.

The appartment is situated in a really interesting neighborood, and it is very functional. Close from the Camden market, close from the underground and also from the pubs and restaurants!
Arrival was very well organized by Iwona, and the lockbox allowes a late arrival.
A few details could improve the global comfort, which is already correct:
It seems like a clogged pipe made the bathroom smell bad from time to time.
The interior-spring mattress is not too firm, although we had a good sleep during our stay.
The internet tv doesn't work good on all chanels, the image freezes and the sound squeezes.
Globally it was a positive choice that we don't regret.

While there were some hiccups with communication, false promises of being able to leave our bags early and the cleaning crew not showing up for our checkin for the duration of our stay. Iwona did tru to fix the issues it just fell short of a clean apartment. Could of just been a bad day who knows. The apartment is very nice and modern and in a great location close to transportation, food and bars. While my review is not the greatest I would give iwona another chance staying there in the future.

Iwona is a lovely host. She communicates very well. We suggested some things during our stay and Iwona arranged these in no time!

Our family of four liked the location and convenience. There’s lots of shops, groceries and eateries. It can be a bit noisey at night. But overall we enjoyed our stay.

Return trip x
A great place and very good host communication
Would definitely return
This is a great place located a short walk to the local tube station, buses, the Camden Market and lots of great pubs and bars
Schicke Wohnung, super Lage!
Top!

Really nice apartment with 2 bedrooms. Really good location, 5min walk from the tube, 5min from Camden Market. A bit noisy, but this is a price to pay to be in the city center. I would recommend and come back any time! Check-in really easy, communication same. Thank you! :)

As others have reviewed the location is outstanding. So many places to eat, drink and buy food literally on your door step.
Tube station short walk away and only a few stops from Kingscross/Euston Stations.
We used earplugs and this allowed us to sleep well.
There was building work going on in the shop below, looks like a complete refit starting just after 8am Mon to Sat. We were up and out early so didn’t bother us and it was finished when we arrived back after 6pm.
If you’re looking for a base to explore that is clean and functional, yeah great. If you’re looking for 5* luxury, comfort and homely maybe not.

Il Bagno era indecente, sporchissimo e pieno di polvere oltretutto le piastrelle della vasca erano situate sotto il lavabo, la ventola dell’areazione era sudicia, e oltretutto l’host dopo la mia richiesta di rimborso ha insinuato che la ventola era esterna, mi pare di capire che non conosce il suo appartamento. L’appartamento non era nello stato in cui le foto mostravano, inoltre a causa della polvere uno dei due bambini che erano nel gruppo ha avuto difficoltà respiratorie (allergica). La dispensa era piena di cibarie anche con muffa, specifico che la marmellata ne aveva uno
Strato spesso un dito, mentre l’host aveva detto in un messaggio che non c’erano neanche il sale e l’olio per un discorso di igiene, il termoconvettore del salotto era staccato da terra, e la tenda della camera lievemente più grande era rotta Avevo indicato anche nella Prenotazione che c’era un bambino piccolo di un anno e una bambina di 6 anni! Ambiente non conforme. Sono veramente delusa. Il mio problema più grande è stato non conoscere la policy di Airbnb per fare immediatamente una segnalazione. Premetto che se alla richiesta del rimborso effettuata tramite app l’host avrebbe semplicemente risposto con un “mi dispiace” , non avrei scritto neanche questa recensione, ma dal momento in cui ho trovato una persona completamente indisposta è giusto che le persone che valuteranno di soggiornare in questo appartamento abbiamo la
Possibilità di prenotare altrove.

A great apartment, very close to Camden Town tube station. Iwona was super friendly and quick to respond to all my questions, she also offered to help when we needed help with our luggage.
Having said that, unfortunately the building right next to the apartment is currently under construction and is incredibly noisy. This of course is not the host's fault and did not make our stay any less great, however it would be good to be prepared and know this beforehand.

Overall, great value for money, centrally located apartment, thanks for everything!
A clean modern finished flat ideal for exploring Camden.

Shop refit next door, noise all day from early morning.
No handrail on first flight stairs from street
Situated just off Camden High St which was very convenient, lots of bars & restaurants in easy reach & very close on foot to Camden Market
Bedding supplied plentiful & spotless as were the towels
Great communication from Iwona & Oz

Excellent location. Very clean. 2 big bedrooms but mattresses not comfortable. It says there is a bed in the living room but its a couch that is not comfortable. It is currently over a building site and the construction workers started working at 8am Saturday morning

its location is suitable and the space is enough.  However, the hot water is not enough for the bath and the rooms are little dirty.  In the front of the door, there were some rubbish bags therefore it was hard to make our luggages into the door.

Great apartment. Spacious main bedroom, amazing location, comfortable amenities. Underground is such a short walk away, the restaurants right around it are brilliant - literally was perfect for us. Would highly recommend!!

This place has all the potential to be a 5-star place, but it is not there yet.

The location is magnificent— Camden is magical: full of hustle and bustle and fantastic energy. With the tube just a quick walk away. The apartment itself is spacious, comfortable, and has a lovely view of the neighborhood.

However:
The stairs in the entry way have no handrail. The stairs in the flat are quite narrow. (I was traveling with my father and it was imposing).

The shower only comes with enough hot water for one shower. The second person (or if you have more than that) will be bathing in cold water. Bummer.

If you are going to book this talk to the host and ensure construction on the next-door restaurant is complete. I do not recommend staying here while that is going on. They start early in the day and also work on weekends. The workers would stand and smoke in the entryway, and they would leave bags of concrete, wood scraps, and miscellaneous items blocking the walkway to enter the flat.

To reiterate, it has the potential to be a great place, and I would even consider staying here again— once the kinks have been ironed out.
Great location

L'appartement est très bien situé au coeur de Camden à deux pas du métro. Les consignes pour trouver la maison sont très claires et le contact avec Iwona très facile.
L'appartement est fonctionnel avec une partie vie (cuisine / salon / salle de bains) au premier étage et deux chambres au deuxième étage.
Cependant, il faut quand même noter que l'isolation phonique est très limite et que l'appartement est donc vraiment très bruyant, difficile de dormir. Surtout qu'à cela s'ajoutent des rideaux quasi inexistants
Perfect heart of Camden location! Great space. :)
Great place, great location!

Het appartement van Iwona is prima gelegen om Londen te verkennen. Het ligt vlakbij een metrostation in de bruisende wijk Camden. Voor ons was het wel te klein om er met vijf te kunnen verblijven. Zo zijn er maar vier stoelen en ook onvoldoende bestek. We hadden ook een probleem met de badkamer maar dat is direct opgelost.
Great host, quick communication. Really nice place
Smooth check in process and clean space. Recommended.

Ideal location and very reactive host. Some kitchen equipment is missing ( microwaves, dishes) and the room on the street is noisy. But other than that, very good stay in the trendy place of Camden town
Amazing location - close to all in Camden, Regents Park and obviously well connected to the rest of London via tube. Had a lovely time there.
Lovely, clean apartment. Great location! Iwona was a great host. We will definitely stay here again
Has a lot of plates, cups, bowls. Equipped with oven but no microwave. Perfect location,  very convenient.
Great stay. Many thanks
This flat was amazing and the host was very helpful! We had a great time. More than you could ask for!

Such an amazing find!

I work in Kingston every now and then so will definitely make this one of my priority AirBnB’s.

Incredibly friendly hosts. Superb room and en-suite. Great breakfast choice.

I’ve stayed here several times now and can honestly say the hosting and room are flawless.

Highly recommended and I’ll continue to stay here with Bella and Zafar

An amazing stay once again!

Thank you both for the hospitality and breakfast.
Another perfect stay. Thanks for the hospitality and the snacks for my day at work!
Amazing as always! 5***
Thanks again!
Perfect as always. Many thanks!
Fab house and beautiful place to stay. So neat and tidy and comfortable. What a beautiful breakfast. Really worth a stay.

An excellent, quiet and safe location. The room and ensuite were spotlessly clean and included everything i could have wished for.
The host is perfect and made sure my stay was problem free and relaxing.

The house was wonderful, we have private bathroom and the principal room is such big, the garden is amazing and relaxing ( with fontaine and floures...)
Mira and her husband were very kind and very welcoming, my opinion : i'm traveler and this experience is one of my best airbnb

If there was a poll to rate the best AirBnB in South London, this AirBnB would be one of the favourites. It is truly 5 stars in the stated categories. Belmira is a fantastic host; her property offers sublime comfort and quality. The stay included an excellent breakfast. Overall, it beat my expectations. The host is setting the standards for all competitors to follow.
Thank you very much Bella, I really enjoyed my stay and was really happy to have met you and zephyr. I will definitely stay again, if you have the availability.
Kind regards, Mark
This is my go to place when staying in Worcester park,  can't fault it in any way. Belmira is a great host.
Lovely place to stay with most welcoming hosts. Highly recommend.
What an amazing stay! With a wonderful host!! Very stylish room with great hospitality!! Can't expect more! Strongly recommended!

This is my second stay. It’s truly 5 stars in all categories. Belmira is a fantastic host; her property offers sublime comfort and quality. The host is setting the standards for all competitors to follow. Zephyr & Belmira are a wonderful couple, lovely people. I will definitely stay again, availability permitting.
I have been staying here Monday to Thursday for 3 months, its an ideal place for working away fro home, has everything you need and is in a safe area with proper off road parking.

Serene, Tranquil, peaceful, calm, 5 star +++, warm friendly, personable; I could go on, but my limited vocabulary will never do justice to the couple of nights (I wish it had been longer), I spent staying with Belmira, and Zafar, in their delightful home.
I was instantly put at ease, and became as relaxed as I am at home, staying in this stunning 5 star family home. I agree with all of the reviews, and especially with Marks comments.
I'm a little reticent to publish this review, because when you find the jewel in the crown, you want to keep it all to yourself, but honesty must prevail. I look forwards to stayin with Belmira, and Zafar in the future, but realise that I might have to plan well in advance, as their popularity (as apparent by the other reviews), will go from strength to strength.
I haven't even mentioned; the reasonable rates, the off street parking, the comfy king size bed, with ensuite, the breakfast choices, the lovely garden, the home made cake, the snacks for my journey home, but I think you've got the picture now; "Above and beyond" prepare to be wowed people!
Spotlessly clean, is exactly as described and is in a safe area. Belmira is a great host.
Friendly, helpful and all you need for a stay for business or pleasure.
All you'll need for a work or private stop-over.  Recommended.

Belmira and Zafar have a beautiful home which they welcomed me into with outstanding hospitality, assuring I felt like part of the family. They are very special people and this is reflected in the standards they set themselves to ensure their guests have everything they could possibly want or need. They told me I was their first lady guest and spoilt me with a glass of bubbly when I arrived to celebrate that.
Bless you both, and thank you, you’re the best hosts.
Lovely room in a lovely house in a very quiet road. Belmira was the perfect host. Would happily stay again.
A return visit and most pleasurable. Most welcoming host and excellent room. Thanks.
A very nice room and a very warm welcome. The host is very friendly, warm and welcoming. I felt totally comfortable and would highly recommend.
Amazing house, incredible hosts. Fantastic value for money.
Belmira was lovely. The suite was better than most hotels. Great breakfast. Nice cake. Many very thoughtful touches.

A Home Away From Home. Can not pick better words for the wonderful stay with Belmira and Zafar. Not for a moment I felt I was living in someone else's home.
Both Belmira and Zafar welcomed me, and treated to a nice cup of tea and Cake. Had a great conversion with them.

The location is easy to find, the room and amenities are perfect and the garden is beautiful.

If I ever come back to London I know where to stay.
10/10 - great hospitality, quiet location and well appointed

A wonderful host and a lovely cosy room.  Belmira goes out of her way to make you feel like one of the family and nothing is too much trouble. I had a super weekend staying at Belmira's beautiful home.
A perfect place to stay, I slept so well the two nights I was here. Nothing was too much trouble and no one would go hungry at Belmira’s place! It’s lovely and peaceful, with parking right outside.

The room with a private bathroom is top of the line. Everything is thought of down to fresh flowers in the bathroom and a fruit bowl to snack on . There is everything you need or even forgot to pack. I would stay again in a snap.
Belmira is such an amazing host. The room and en-suite is lovely, clean and spacious, Belmira has added so many thoughtful touches and really adds so many extra things to your stay. She is the best!
If your are visiting this part of Surrey and need a base then this is it.  Spotless and great facilities. Five stars all round. Will recommend. If I visit again this will be top of my list.
Excellent stay. Serene surroundings. Delicious breakfast. Wonderful hospitality.
Belmiras’ place is wonderful, homely and very comfortable, communication was excellent and I can thoroughly recommend a stay here ! Infact I will be staying again ! Thanks Belmira

I booked at very late notice, so I was very lucky to visit (for a second time), this beautiful, & most definitely Serene home.
It was such a shame I could only stay for one night. I feel totally relaxed as soon as I am greeted by Belmira.
Belmira & Zafar are a wonderful hospitable hosts. Not only are you in a beautiful, Serene, & comfortable home, but another great treat awaits you in the morning; as Belmira prepares a bountiful delicious breakfast, of your choosing, to start your day. If you wish to converse Belmira is on hand, or if you want to get on with your day, that is fine as well.
If I could give more than 5 gold stars I would. Airbnb will have to come up with a higher standard, 5 Platinum stars, or maybe 5 diamonds for Belmira.
Thank you Belmira, a home from home, made very welcome , so much so I’m coming back
Another wonderful stay at Belmira’s thanks again !

Time limited, but it’s still a wonderful staying at with Belmira’s house.  Lovely and cozy room with en-suite, nice fruits and breakfast, thoughtful caring of picking us from the train station and wait until night.  Can’t miss this place if you have chance to London, very convenient traffic to the London city center.  Belmira is the best caring host I ever met, highly recommend.
Another great stay, thank you Belmira

Exceptional place,  beautiful surroundings,  Balmira and her hubby really exceeded my expectations.  Thanks for the lil garden tour, the A la carte breakfast, the navigation tips, and those crisp organic apples.

Belmira's place is beautiful, spacious, sparkling clean, stylish. There are fresh flowers and fruit bowl in the room. Breakfast was delightful.
Belmira is very nice, friendly, helpful. She even picked some apple from her garden for me to eat on the road.
Another great stay at Belmira’s a home from home
You are in for a real treat if you stay in Belmira's  house. It is a long time since I have had such hospitality and in such an amazingly comfortable, clean and welcoming house.

It was lovely to meet and be hosted by Bella. I really enjoyed her generous hospitality and conversation. A real home from home with a delicious plentiful breakfast in a beautiful house with a gorgeous garden
I will definitely be returning.
Another great stay at Belmira’s, very relaxing and comfortable, thanks again !

Another Great stay at Belmira’s, thoughtful and Very Comfortable, a home from home.
Thanks again Belmira

I stayed at Bella's place for two nights, I had a wonderful time staying at Bella's house, she is a wonderful host and so so helpful, I was so skeptical before booking thru Airbnb, as this was my first experience, and trust me it was fantastic.

I am very used to drinking tea and she made sure everything was available for me to be comfortable, they made sure i feel home, and trust me i did, had a lovely chat with the couple on the dining table and reminded me of my dad and mum.

I learnt how to make Beetroot soup from her and will definitely try making it.

Her House was the best, so neat and clean, no complain at all, she made sure i am able to commute in the city with east i have my train card, and made sure to pick and drop me from the station. Not to forget the lovely apples i pick from her garden.

I would highly recommend Bellas home, and will book again when i am back to london Would definitely use Airbnb again
Another great Stay at Belmira’s, made to feel very welcome , thanks again!
Outstanding service, I recommended very much. Super clean, super nice host. I loved the reservation.

A peaceful and beautiful location.  Belmira was a delightful host and her home was a pleasure to stay in. The room was large and airy and the cleanliness was second to none. Breakfast was wonderful and Belmira attended to every requirement. The view into the garden was stunning. I cant recommend enough and look forward to returning.

If I could give 10 out of 5 I would happily do that. The place was like a five star hotel, so clean and fresh. The hosts were amazing, helpful and went out of their way to make me comfortable.

Belmira makes an absolutely wonderful cup of tea, and I enjoyed a lovely discussion with the whole family. The hosts are very kind, genuine and caring.

I would happily stay here again

Our stay at Belmira’s was the best Airbnb experience we have had, she is very welcoming and her hospitality is beyond expectations. From the small attentions to always offering to help with anything we might need. We thank you very much for the lovely stay and will definitely come back in the future!

Obrigada
Belmira is a Wonderful host with a very Comfortable and relaxing house

Belmira's room is lovely with a huge and super comfortable bed with high quality bed linens and en-suite bathroom. Belmira is a wonderful host so friendly and kind . She provided a lovely breakfast and even gave me a lift to the bus stop on a very cold morning. I cannot recommend Belmira's B & B highly enough.
Another Great Stay at Belmira’s, Relaxing and comfortable

I had a wonderful stay at Bella's place. Bella and her husband were so welcoming and friendly and made me feel at home. The bed is incredibly comfortable and the room and the ensuite was spotlessly clean. The breakfast in the morning was such a lovely touch! Bella really did go above and beyond to make my stay as comfortable as possible. Thank you so much! I will be back :)
Excellent location and great place to stay, Belmira makes sure you are very well kept. Can't fault a thing.
Another wonderful stay. Thank you!
Super clean with lots of thoughtful touches. Belmira is a superhost! Can’t recommend highly enough!!
Such a wonderful host and comfortable stay , thank you Belmira
Excellent value and hospitality best kept secret
I have stayed at Belmira's place for a more than couple of times. This is my first choice to book. Belmira makes the stay very pleasant indeed!! Highly recommended..
Another Wonderful stay at Belmira’s, what a wonderful host and comfortable place to stay , highly recommended

Belmira's place is very easy to find with sat nav, and we could use her parking place as well. She is a welcoming and warm person. Her house is sparkling clean with a warm atmosphere. The room feels like a 5* hotel, bed is comfortable with high quality bedding, breakfast was very nice and chatting with Belmira was very pleasant, as she is a very charming person. We are highly recommending Belmina's place and we would love to come back.

Stanza privata abbastanza spaziosa, pulita in maniera ineccepibile. La host è estremamente gentile e disponibile: ogni giorno prepara una colazione abbondante e gustosa, e si è sempre offerta di accompagnarci in stazione con la sua macchina (anche se si trova a un quarto d’ora di distanza a piedi)
Consiglierei questo alloggio ad amici e parenti che volessero visitare Londra, perché ha reso il nostro viaggio davvero perfetto!
Another Wonderful stay at Belmira’s, a real treat

Belmira’s place is my top preference. I have stayed there quite a few times now. The bed is Super comfortable and the place is always sparkly clean. Belmira is always willing to help to make the stay extra comfortable!! Five stars!!
A comfortable stay at Belmira’s

Belmira has been an amazing host, her house is lovely, the bedroom was as comfortable, cozy and clean as can be, the breakfast was delicious and we felt very welcome. Our stay at Belmira's exceeded our expectations, we would absolutely recommend and love to visit again.
Belmira is extremely patient and welcoming and an outstanding host. Couldn’t recommend enough
very happy with the room would recommend for anyone wanting to visit London not far from central London room was very clean well presented and great value for money !!

Belmira is an incredible humankind. So much devoted and absolutely wonderful. She will do her best to help you, everytime. She helped us a lot through everything. We will comeback! I can only recommend Belmira's place.
From Laura and Romain
Belmira is so kind, so lovely and so thoughtful. The room was spacious and very comfortable.
As a repeat guest I am thankful for Belmira’s wonderful hospitality and thoughtfulness. Highly recommended
A Wonderful Host and highly recommended
It was lovely experience staying with Belmira. Her house and the setting are beautiful and Belmira is wonderful lady and host. Highly recommended!

Belmira is a kind and thoughtful host - just lovely! I’ve been doing overnight stays in the area for 18 months and am sad to have only just discovered Belmira as I am about to change jobs! The accommodation is spotless, very comfortable, quiet and with thoughtful additions such as chocolates! Belmira provides a great breakfast too. I wholeheartedly recommend a stay with Belmira.

Been staying at Belmira's for 3 days per week for 1 year today!11

It has totally suited my needs whilst on a work contract, alas my contract comes to an end on 5th March 2020 so the place will now be free Mondays to Thursdays as well, you wont be disappointed.
Another great stay at Belmira’s, a warm and comfortable home from home . A wonderful Host

Amazing place to stay, hospitality above and beyond, such a lovely lady who could not do enough for, room was immaculate with everything you need, but most of all was her kindness and making my stay warm and welcoming. A big big thank you, Liz
Another great stay at Belmira’s, thank you
Another great stay at Belmira’s, a wonderful host and comfortable stay
The most perfect hosts and the loveliest place to stay, I really can’t recommend this host more highly .
A very welcoming stay yet again at Belmira’s,

I travel a lot for work and I can confidently say this is truly the “home from home”. Belmira really made me feel welcomed, the room is very clean and tastefully designed. The hotel like room preparation is second to none. She also made the checking in so easy. I’d recommend this place to anyone. Thank you Belmira!!
Another Wonderful stay at Belmira’s as always a Super Host and very comfortable, thank you
Superb in all ways you choose to look at the facilities

You will have to search far and wide to find a host more friendly and hospitable than Bella.
Bella and Zafar have a beautiful home - the posted pictures do not do it any justice at all.
The home is in a perfect central location and you literally sense the warmth and love in the house. I HIGHLY Recommend Bella's & Zafar's home - you wont want to ever leave :-)

Belmira is a fabulous host and her house is a wonderful place to stay with an absolutely gorgeous garden! Her sense of hospitality has exceeded our expectations again on our second stay with her, can't recommend highly enough.

Strayed 1 night with Belmira, from the first point of communication to leaving everything was outstanding. Fantastic welcome second to none. I was made more than welcome and felt like home. I would definitely stay again and look forward to it aswel. Highly recommended

What a beautiful home to be welcomed into by two lovely people.

I was delighted to be invited into the gorgeous garden for tea and home made cake on my arrival. The room itself is of the highest quality and the bed, wow.. so comfortable!

Easy parking and simple to find, an excellent stay.
Had a wonderful stay in a lovely clean house. Lovely room with a comfortable bed & an en-suite with large shower area.  The owner is such a kind and attentive host. Highly recommended
3rd time I've stayed and just as awesome as always!!!  Having parking facilities has been priceless for me!  Thanks Belmira!
Wonderful hosts in a wonderful home.
Brilliantly peaceful, homely, warm and friendly.  The perfect place.  Would highly recommend.
My stay with Belmira was outstanding. She's so very welcoming and super helpful. The location was perfect for my needs and I have booked to stay again.

Without a doubt, this is one of the best places I've been around . Besides the outstanding and unique room and facilities on offer, it wouldn't be the same without the kind and humble touches of Belmira and Zafar. They offered everything and you will instantly feel at home. Bless them both for their welcoming and generous character, by far one of best hosts around.
A perfect home from home.  Beautifully quiet and peaceful, warm, cosy and a wonderfully comfortable and friendly place to stay.

Staying at Belmira's place is gold. Belmira is a wise humble human who is willing to go the extra mile in every way possible to make your stay perfect.  And she achieves it 100 percent.  Thank-you, once again, I will be back
Warmth and so caring. Such a peaceful location the ambiance was wonderful.

Had a pleasant stay in such a beautiful and quite area. The room was perfect and has a amazing en suite. I always felt welcomed and at home with Belmira always trying to go the extra mile in doing so. One of my best air bnb stays ever. I would highly recommend and will definitely return. Thank you so much

the most hospitable by far! I was touched by the welcoming gestures. does the best service, offers much than expected and goes an extra mile in many ways that you wouldn't expect..thanks again. highly appreciated, recommended and would visit back

Belmira is a vey warm hearted and generous person. Her house is spotless and safe. Close to transport links it has easy links to the city and yet is quiet enough to unwind in. Would recommend unreservedly.
A wonderful host so kind and thoughtful I didn’t want to leave. Beautiful house and garden so quiet yet close to bus and rail links. I can’t wait to go back!
Massive thank you to Belmira for making us feel so welcome. The room was perfect and exactly as described. The breakfast was fab too.

Another outstanding stay with Belmira, I absolutely love to visit, she is so welcoming, hospitable and kind. Meticulously clean and tidy, I highly recommend this place. Thank-you as always for going above and beyond x

Belmiras was a perfect place to stay when visiting friends & family. She was a wonderful host and kindly provided teas & biscuits on arrival and a fabulous breakfast spread. The room was comfy with a very comfortable bed. She also has a beautiful garden.

Belmira made me feel very welcome. The double room was very comfortable with extra touches, such as a bowl of fruit and lots of towels. Great hot shower and everything sparkly clean. There was a varied breakfast laid on - fruit juice, toast, yogourt and cereals. Belmira offered to make me eggs or porridge.
Belmira gave me a lift to the shops and did other little things to make me feel looked after!
I was on a business trip and the accommodation was perfect and I would highly recommend it

Belmira’s place is absolutely perfect! The room had everything we needed and was spotless clean, the bed was so comfy, the breakfast was abundant and overlooking her beautiful garden. Belmira’s hospitality exceeded our expectations, she played with my daughter and gave her flowers from her garden! We will definitely come back next time we visit Hobbledown or Chessington Park again. Highly recommended. Thank you!

This is an amazing Airbnb experience. The house is immaculate, Bella is so accommodating and thinks of everything you might need. Breakfast is included and amazing value. The room is beautiful with a stunning en-suite. I had the pleasure of being able to relax in the garden too. Extra touches such as little chocolate snacks were most appreciated. I will definitely stay again if working in the area.
Thank you!

Exceptional!! Bella was so warm and welcoming towards us, we felt very much at home. We were greeted with tea and scrumptious home made scones upon arrival. The house is beautiful and the room we stayed in is well furnished with a large very comfortable bed and is scrupulously clean. The garden is nothing short of inspiring. Breakfast was plentiful with lots of choice and was delicious. All in all Bella is quite simply an exceptional host.
Melmira is  very helpful. The place is quiet with the beautiful garden. i would recommend to stay.

A great place to stay. Bella is very welcoming and goes above and beyond to make your stay the best it can be. Breakfast was great. There are no tea and coffee making facilities in the room but you do have access to them in Belmira’s kitchen. It truly was a pleasure to stay there and the garden is beautiful. We hope to return in the future.

This was one of my favourite stays, but I say that every time I stay withe Bella & Zafar in their beautiful home. Relaxing, regenerating, catching up with my family (who all live locally). From watching the footy on their large TV, to relaxing in the garden, it was more like taking a family holiday than just a BnB stay.
I don't knowabout 5 stars; I concur with all the other reviewers, & would give 10 stars if I could! Many many thanks again
A fabulous place to stay, so clean, so quiet and such a wonderful host. Thank you Belmira, look forward to seeing you again soon.

Lovley, clean, comfortable place with a beautiful garden. Belmira is an attentive, welcoming and generous host. Tea on arrival and a nice breakfast with a selection of breads included. Excellent shower.
Excellent host, lovely house and garden. Belmira is a very sociable person and pays high attention to detail. Excellent breakfast.

I booked for a trip to Wimbledon. It was absolutely ideal for this. A short 10 min, brisk walk to the Worcester Park Station and a ten minute train ride to Wimbledon Station. Belmira offered me lifts to/from the station though. Exceptionally good value with an honest price, not inflated for the Championships , and not much more than the price of parking your car there for the day!

5* accommodation to a hotel standard, together with all the advantages of being in a house. I agree with all the other very positive reviews.

Book now for next year!
Such a warm welcome, spotlessly clean home, all mod cons, easy access to London... excellent B&B

We enjoyed every aspect of our stay with Belmira. She is a very welcoming, thoughtful and generous host, it is some time since we have been so well looked after. It was great to be able to park and leave our car in her driveway, the location is quiet and the walk (to us at least) to the overground train service in to Waterloo Station is very easy at around 10 - 15 minutes.
So, all round fabulous value and a lovely experience.

This was our second stay at Bella's home and we were made to feel so welcome yet again. Bella is generous and exceptionally thoughtful, we felt relaxed within moments of arriving. The house is homely, exceptionally clean and wonderfully furnished. The garden was in full bloom during our stay and looked stunning. It was an absolute pleasure to stay at Bella's home and we look forward to staying again. An absolute gem of a find on Airbnb.

Bela puts the super in super host.
We were looking for a place to stay close to Wimbledon as we wanted a simple journey to and from the tennis, Bela's place was an excellent choice. We were warmly welcomed with tea and pastel de nata . And the following morning we had a fantastic breakfast.
Bela even gave us a few cuttings from her wonderful garden.
Thanks for a great place to stay :)
You could not be more welcomed. Second stay for me and Bella is a fantastic host, warm person, with nothing too much and goes well beyond what's expected to ensure you have a comfortable stay.

It doesn't get any better than Belmira's!
A warm, friendly, super duper host willing to make your stay as perfect as possible. The room and bathroom have absolutely everything you could need - great mattress for a back sufferer - slept like a dream!
Breakfast was scrumptious for a gluten, dairy intolerant - once again, Belmira's thoughtfulness in catering for me shone through.
Either relaxing or eating breakfast looking out over her fantastic garden bursting with summer colour was, for me, just wonderful.
What more can I say - truly the best airbnb I've stayed in.

This is a lovely place just a 10-15 walk from Worcester Park Train station.  The room is spotlessly clean and Belmira is a superb host.  She cannot do enough to help and I had a really fantastic time.

I stayed here for 3 nights as I was working in the area, what a great experience l, great host, so caring attentive, really good experience. Such a nice garden it’s real calming and relaxing, I really enjoyed my stay. 110% recommend xx

Book for one night only as I was attending a friend's party near by. I was absolutely perfect. Bella very kindly offered to give me a lift. The room was absolutely spotless and the bed was as comfortable as you get in a 5-stars hotel. Very quiet location, and dark room, perfect for a restorative night's sleep. Faultless. Thank you, Bella. I shall be back.

If you local to this area and need somewhere stay check this place out!!! The level of service you get from Bella is truly great, she goes way above what she needs to. The room was clean and cosy and the shower room is beautiful!! So get down their and check it out!!!!!!!!!
Excellent service - I would not hesitate to book again and highly recommend.
Stayed for two nights as I was attending a course at Kingston University. Great location and Bella was so welcoming. Checking in late was not an issue and the room offered everything you could need.
Fabulous all round. X

Bellas place is amazing, it was spotless and comfortable. It is walking distance to both Worcester park and Malden manor stations . Bella was an amazing host , and regularly checked in with me to make sure I had everything I needed. I couldn’t recommend her place enough.

Superb accommodation! Bella’s place is certainly not your average Airbnb. Her place is one of the cleanest places I have stayed in! …Bella is also very hospitable. She has gone above and beyond in helping me. Thank you, Bella.
Brilliant room.
One of the best stays I have ever had, she was so welcoming and accommodating, supplying water in the room and a great breakfast. So clean and tidy will definitely stay again !

The location was quiet, peaceful and not at all far from the high street, about 10 mins walk. There are 2 stations nearby and I arrived at Malden Manor and Bella picked us up. There was confusion at first which station but eventually all worked out! Lovely home and indeed the best garden I’ve ever seen! Would for sure recommend and with breakfast included it’s a great value.
Bella was an excellent host! A beautiful house surounded by a magnificent garden. Cleanliness was an obvious priority and nothing was too much trouble during our 3 day stay. Highly recommended!!
Bella was a perfect host in a lovely house. Very accommodating and welcoming. I will definitely return!

A superb house, and a lovely large room to stay in with a roomy en-suite bathroom, including a powerful walk in shower.

Bella was the most hospitable host, making sure I was comfortable and in the morning laying on a fantastic breakfast before I left for work.

Highly recommended and unbelievable value.
Perfect for an overnight stop while on business. Spotlessly clean and very comfortable. Good choice of breakfast. Bella is an excellent host - nothing was too much trouble.

If we could give 6 stars we would! We stayed with Bella while renovating our house, and we really felt like home. The room and bath were spotless and quiet. But most of all their kindness and generosity will always be remembered. Thank you!

Excellent stay at Bella's house.
Very welcoming on arrival, lovely clean and comfortable room and an excellent breakfast, with freshly made porridge.
Bella was an amazing host, and I would definitely stay again. Highly recommended.

I love staying at Bella’s she is an amazing host so thoughtful and kind and the room is spotless, quiet and comfy. Lovely breakfast too. Took my husband this time and he can’t wait to go back. Thank you Bella and Zafar for welcoming us into your home. Pam & John
Really good facilities and host. No hesitation in recommending if this the area you need to be in.
A real find! The accomodation is very spacious and exceptionally clean. The hostess goes above and beyond to make you feel welcome. I will be staying again without doubt. Thank you Bella.
An excellent place to stay, with a wonderful continental breakfast, Thank you Bella
a 5star experience

It’s such an enjoyable stay at Bella’s home. The room is spacious, clean and warm, the bathroom very convenient with everything provided just in case you forgot to bring something. The bed is comfortable and I had good sleep throughout all nights.

Bella is passionate about hosting that she’s kind to offer pick up from station, picked some apples from trees in garden and let me try and serve breakfast etc. She had prepared different kinds of tea and many jams and cereal choices at breakfast too.

And don’t miss the garden if you have time, very big and beautiful garden. My schedule was busy so pity I didn’t enjoy a coffee overlooking her garden.

Overall it’s really enjoyable stay at Bella’s home and I appreciated for every effort she’s trying made guest had wonderful stay.

you can expect a very welcoming host, a beautiful and very clean house, a great variety of breakfast options or live off the land lol with her home grown apples. what a privilege and joy to stay at a friendly host's house. floor, utensils, facilities, kitchen, bedroom all spotless. I would recommend a thousand times.

Wonderfully comfortable and spotlessly clean accommodation, enhanced by many extra and unexpected touches provided by a warm and welcoming host. For those who've had enough of looking out of hotels onto car parks, Bella's garden will be a particular delight.
Thank you so much for having me. xx
Fantastic host , nothing is too much trouble

Like going home to your Mother for an overnighter. Bella couldnt do enough for me and prepared a lovely homely breakfast to boot.
She's a real super host!

We really enjoyed our stay with Bella. Her hospitality , kindness and travel advice were first rate. The place was beautiful and clean. We can truly say it is the best airbnb we have stayed at and we would highly recommend Bella's place.  Best Regards Gordon and Debra
Bella’s place is serene and cozy environment , away from the London Noise. Her hospitality is  and she is an amazing host. Would go back again and again.
Bella is the most considerate host I’ve ever met.
Another lovely stay with Bella who keeps an immaculate house and makes your stay an absolute pleasure. X

A wonderful nights stay at Bella's lovely house. Not just a superhost but the perfect host, going way beyond the norm. A lovely bedroom, with access to the garden room and kitchen. All immaculately clean and the garden was beautiful. Many thanks to Bella for making our stay such a pleasure.
Excellent stay again
if you ever need to stay in Worcester park. give Bella a call she is great.
Expect a great host a great spankingly clean room. I almost don't want to give a review so only I get availability.... Awesome stay.. always!!!!!

You can expect a very welcoming guest. Free onsite parking. Extremely clean house. Great breakfast bar. Very warm and homely room with amazing en-suite. Very spacious shower. Free WiFi. Great warm soft bedding and pillows.

Bella was a wonderful hostess and exceeded all expectations.
The room was well equipped and spotlessly clean.
I can’t rate Bella and her home more highly - truly wonderful.
Thank you.

Amazing stay. Bella is very nice and welcoming. Highly recommend staying over there. I have already booked it again. Room is immaculate and clean and she will make you breakfast in the morning which is an absolute dream :)
Clean room with a comfortable bed. Very friendly host. Nice breakfast:) Thank you!:)

Everything is perfect at Bella’s. The room is very clean and tidy. Her house is peaceful as well as beautiful. Bella will offer you all the amenities you need and make you the best breakfast and tea! She is a lovely host and I am glad I spent a weekend at her place. Highly recommend, you wont regret!!
I’ve had a wonderful stay at Bella’s house! She’s a very friendly and hospitable lady:) The room is very clean, with a very comfortable bed.
What a beautiful home and the most lovely hosts you could ask for. Wondefully bright,clean and homely. Thank you for a wonderful stay and we can't wait to come back.

Jo and Steve are truly lovely hosts and their home is in a great location in Greater London. The area is quiet and safe, and yet only 30 mins on the train to central London (the local station is less than 5 mins walk). Also well connected to Sutton, the Royal Marsden Hospital and ICR. Their whole house is newly decorated and the finish is immaculate. The room and bathroom were spotless. Very highly recommended.
Thank you for a cosy stay! Great hospitality, stunning & modern home. We'd love to come back and will most definitely recommend this. XXO

This is it!
Very friendly hosters, sparkling clean interior, beautiful garden, longue area for guests (with comfy sofas (and TV if needed)) easy access to trains and buses. Just 10 minutes by bus or train to Sutton Central and 45 minutes to Central London. Nice and calm area. I highly recommend this place.

Had the absolute pleasure at staying at jo and steve house. Could not find a fault it if I tried with the house which is outstanding from top to bottom. Jo and Steve are a credit to airbnb very welcoming and helpful. And even reciveied a birthday and cake on my birthday.  Could not rate this place high enough

Jo and Steve's place is an absolute delight to stay at. They are the perfect hosts and generously share their lovely home with their guests. It is very conveniently located, sparkling clean and comfortable. We look forward to returning!
Fantastic room with nice views and great design, where warm and friendly people with lots of love and high level of hospitality to make a beautiful place at all the time. Thanks Jo and Steve ❤️❤️❤️
Very gracious hosts, beautiful home, conveniently located to train station

Stayed 2 weeks at this place. Extremely comfortable stay at this beautiful, quaint place. The neighborhood is superb and the train and bus station are just a few minutes away by walking. Highly recommended.

We had a very wonderful stay at Jo & Steve's home. The room and toilet are very bright and clean. The host family is very nice to us. Carshalton Beeches is a nice place to stay away from the crowd with easy access to the train station. I highly recommend this place to everyone!

What can I say, if your ever in need of a clean, comfortable place to stay with warm welcoming people, look no further than Jo & Steve's place, it ticks all the box's and much more, Ill be booking it again when I'm next in the area and I hope and pray they will have the room for me.

The house is lovely- clean and tidy, with a great location and a lovely garden. A super Italian restaurant and other shops etc. are within a few minutes walk and the hosts are friendly and welcoming. They even left a couple of chilled beers for me which was a thoughtful gesture. Highly recommended.

Our stay at Jo and Steve was brilliant ! The bedroom and private spaces were comfortable, newly renovated, neat and spotlessly clean. They both are so nice, joyful and thoughtful, the communication was perfect at every step and they were really responsive and helpful.
The house is full of light and beautiful and the garden is so great when the weather is nice.
Carshalton is a charming neighborhood with great pubs and bakery.
Cannot recommend higher
We had a wonderful and pleasant stay.. the hosts were lovely.. felt homely!!

This is a perfect place to stay. Excellent quality accommodation with nice decor, exceptional cleanliness, a very comfortable bed, the bonus of a private bathroom and fantastic hosts. Jo and Steve are welcoming, friendly and happy to help in whatever way the guest needs. Also the arrangement was perfect in the sense that I was completely free to come and go at whatever time suited me, and it was a haven of peace and tranquility to return to after a busy day. Highly recommended!

My mom stayed with Steve and Jo for two weeks whilst she was visiting from America. Their home is beautiful and they made her feel so welcome. They’re in a great location, very close to amenities and the train station. Highly recommend if you want a home away from home when you visit south london. Thanks!

Jo and Steve have a gorgeous home in a fantastic area that is close to everything you need. They are both so warm and welcoming, you feel tight at home. The rooms are clean and private and the bed is so comfy. Would stay here again.
The room was perfect and in a fantastic location. I would highly recommend and wouldn’t hesitate to book with Jo again when looking for accommodation in the area.
Rebecca is super nice. She is nice and warm.
Nice warm space, great tv. Friendly.
Tidy place with a warm & friendly host that has useful knowledge about the surroundings.

My partner and I stayed at Rebecca’s place for two nights while looking for flats to rent in London.

Rebecca’s place is great value for money. It’s clean and cozy and very private. It’s a 12 minute walk from the station and there are buses that go right to the street the house is near, ~5 min walk. Her home is beautifully decorated and nice and warm- very welcoming. Rebecca is a lovely host and although our check in was a bit later than we had planned, she was very quick to respond and arrange with us. She was also very knowledge about London and different areas to visit or look for flats in.

The only thing I would say though is that the bed is quite squeaky generally, so if there’s two of you and one of you is a restless and light sleeper- bring earplugs. I did and wasn’t too bothered by the noise, but my partner (who tosses and turns quite a lot in his sleep) kept waking himself up. Overall I would definitely recommend staying here if you want a safe and cozy room to sleep in.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Amazing place, Very clean and easy to figure out
Nice flat in nice place
Great place, really clean and tidy and really smart. Good location too.
Great flat, attentive hosts
A modern 2 bedroom stylish flat close to Tooting Bec tube (10 mins walk). Great base for London.
The space is very stylish! Very clean. Great location.

This was a nice clean place with good facilities. However, there was a strange sign on one of the windows saying that there was video surveillance. Obviously this was very concerning to us, we contacted the hosts admin but didn't get a response so there was a lot of back and forth without an answer. It wasn't until we said that if we didn't receive a response soon we would escalate the matter, that the hosts admin got back to us immediately and gave us an answer which didn't put our minds at ease. They said the sticker was for the main entrance but we felt that if that was the case then why was this sticker on the window of this apartment(on the top floor). We have raised this matter with Airbnb. Additionally, it appeared that the apartment was currently being lived in as all the hosts belongings were present, including cloths in the wardrobes and toothbrushes in the bathroom and family pictures. This was bizarre to us and meant that there wasn't much storage space for our belongs/cloths etc.

A very nice place, very calm, and only a few meters from the Underground station (no noise from trains!) which is indeed very convenient. District line brings you directly to Central London. I felt very welcome, and the communication was easy (English and French spoken). The room is not big, but with kitchen and bathroom next door, so it's almost as having your own private little corner. Very clean and with everything I could think of including breakfast. I highly recommend this place!
very nice place the host was good , the bed was so comfortable, and not far from the train station x
Great host and nice flat in convenient area next to district line tube station

A very comfortable bed in a quiet room, important as I was sleeping in the day between night shifts. Great location for my needs, good transport links and host was very accommodating with my check in/out requirements. Would definitely stay here again, thanks Sarah!
Excellent location, very convenient and close to public transport. Very quiet despite being ground floor.
Sarah is delightful to stay with - very friendly and helpful.  And the location is amazing basically backing onto Gunnesbury Station, however there never noise from the trains.
Fantastic location, 1 min walk from    Gunnersbury tube. Clean room would stay again

Superb location for the tube [District line]station behind the flat and another District line tube station 10minutes max walk away. Quiet location, very comfortable bed and clean flat. Bedroom quite basic. Shared bathroom small with a not very good electric shower [I’ve yet to come across a good electric shower anyway!]
Comfortable room, Great location, with easy access to transport and shops.

Billie and Max’s place is great! Lovely leafy location and perfect for getting about London as only a 5/10 minute walk to the tube station.

The apartment was lovely, clean and had everything you would need for a short stay in London.

We were a little cold at times as the radiators didn’t get very hot but this didn’t bother us too much as we were only there one night. However, great communication with the hosts as we told them when we left and they have already had a plumber in to check everything is working as it should!

Great place, great hosts, would definitely stay again!

What a lovely find! The location was perfect- just a short stroll to Kensington park (right next to Hyde park) and so close to some great London attractions including Harrods and the Natural History Museum and also importantly transport links.

There were some lovely touches in the apartment including a magazine, access to Netflix (if you already have an account) and a file with some local tips of places to go and eat.

The hosts were always easy to get in touch with and the electronic key system was brilliant, so there was no need to have a specific check in time as the keys were readily available via an app after check in time.

The apartment itself was beautiful with some basic kitchen items and in a lovely building, which is currently having some final building touches done so it all feels very new and clean. I think it’s a lovely apartment, great location and a brilliant price and wouldn’t hesitate to book again!

The room was lovely and clean and looked as it does in photos.  The location was also perfect, within a 2 min walk to a corner shop and close walk to Kensington Highstreet.  The building did have building work going on during the day but we were aware of this and didn't cause us any problems.  There were some great suggestions for places to eat and visit if you are a new tourist to the area.  Overall we really enjoyed our stay and will definitely look at booking Billie and Max's rooms again!

Beautiful studios with classy high-spec decor. Excellent location close to restaurants, tube stations and Hyde Park. The only downside I would say was that the second room we slept in was very very cold, but I Believe this will be taken care of. Everything is was wonderful, we would rent again from Max and Billie.
Lovely place in a nice area
Lovely place in a very nice area. Super easy check in with the app, room clean and pristine!
the room is ok but it was cold and noisy.
Very stylish studio !

Wonderful location!  Very close to the Tube and a good value. Billie and Max even let us keep our bags in their office for the day until check-in time so that we could explore the city more easily. Would definitely come back.
It was such a great location! Perfect for a cute night in London. Absolutely stunning space and Ellie was a great help I needed with everything!
Highly recommended! Nice spot for exploring the city
We really enjoyed our stay, what a great apartment in a gorgeous location. We will definitely book again!
Highly recommended this place! It’s very nice and quite, we really enjoyed our stay in here.
Fantastic apartment in a great location. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay, thank you so much for being great hosts!

Conforme à la description! Très agréable, super séjour dans ce studio!
A refaire sans hésiter :)

An absolute gem! After travelling we finished our final leg of the journey inntgos beautiful airbnb. It was comfortable, luxurious and homely at the same time. I will definetly be staying here and again and have already recommended it to friends. Thanks Billie and Max !

Great studio space... billie and max were great at commutation and the place was exactly as described. I really loved the easy ness of checking in with the app... it was super simple. I’d recommend their place to other travellers after a clean comfy space.

The apartment was very nice and in a beautiful location. Everything was super clean and neat. Would definitely recommend if you’re looking for a home away from the crowded, busy, streets of London. Thank you Billie and Max!

Billie and Max's appartement is very clean, nice and cozy. My son and I found everything we needed. It's close to the subway and bus station. Communication with Billie and Max was very good, timely and clear. We loved our stay.

We loved our stay in Billie and Max’s studio. It is a lovely big, bright room in a great location. It has everything you need. Very comfortable bed and sparkling clean. Some great tips for local restaurants. Easy check in and good communication. We wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again.
Great flat! Would definitely stay here again.
Great space and sparkling clean! Very good location close to everything you need. Was very easy to check in and hosts were very responsive!
Really pleasant stay, great location, 5 minute walk from Notting Hill Gate Station. Very spacious, clean apartment on a classic Kensington street.

Bill & Max were helpful from the start and their studio was is the ideal stay for a few days in London. Easy access to London trains, buses, restaurants & shops. Great location.
Janet

Wow. This studio in a modernized Georgian building was absolutely stunning and surrounded by beauty on all sides with spring in almost full bloom now in London. It’s easily identifiable with the pink door and plushly decorated. I wish I could have stayed more than one night! I haven’t slept so well during my whole stay in Europe. The apartment is bright modern and perfectly located near Kensington Gardens, Hyde Park and Notting Hill.

The balcony overlooks a quiet neighborhood street making it easy to spot your Uber driver or taxi in style when you open the blinds and sit in the well appointed marble table. Or go out into the balcony. The space is small but feels roomy with high ceilings and mirrors. The bathroom was pristinely clean with plush towels, all the hot water for the bath I needed to feel clean after a long flight.

I hope to return very soon! Thanks for having me! Don’t hesitate to stay beee if you’d like to be in a posh neighborhood setting in a very safe and beautiful area.

Beautiful and clean, it’s just like the photos. Billie and Max have done a very nice job of providing guests with a safe & comfortable studio, maximizing the space to its fullest efficiency. A great location, the hosts have a binder with helpful information about getting around the area, which is quite pretty.
Will definitely stay again if given the chance.

We absolutely loved our stay at this place!! It was SO convenient, right between 2 Underground stops which made everything easily accessible. The room itself was adorable, with great closet space and large windows. We loved the balcony and enjoyed wine and cheese on it more than once. The neighborhood itself it so cute and has fun bars, restaurants, coffee shops and a Whole Foods within walking distance. We are so happy with our stay here & are already planning to go back!
It's an adorable, comfortable place in a wonderful neighborhood. Great hosts made everything easy and convenient.
Great apartment. Just as shown in the pictures. Brilliant little kitchen. Gorgeous Kensington street and terrace view. Lovely 5 minute walk from Notting Hill gate station. Would highly recommend!

The location is great, building nice, host very accommodating!  There are many good food options close by as well as the subway.  We recommend staying here! Thanks Billie and Max for storing our luggage too.  Lovely apartment.

Stylish small space in a beautiful street. Lovely aspect to front of street. Comfortable and clean and a short walk to Kensington high street. Basic facilities for a simple meal. Ideal for a couple of nights. Just make sure your phone is always charged otherwise you would not be able to get in via the key app!
Great stay at a great location
Perfect location. Clean and efficient accommodations.
Gut in einem Wohnquartier gelegen, sehr ruhig, toll eingerichtet und sehr praktische Details (es hat Tee, Kaffee, Gewürze vorhanden...)!

It’s truly an amazing, clean and quiet location. Plenty around to do and see.
I’ll definitely be booking this accommodation in the future.

The flat is well-appointed and has beautiful tall ceilings that make it feel much larger than it is. Everything was spotless. The bathroom had nice fixtures, good water pressure and temp controls in the shower. It's in the middle of a lovely neighborhood with plenty of sightseeing, restaurants, cafes, and pubs. Would definitely book here again in the future.

Super séjour dans un studio hyper bien placé à la décoration soignée.
Proche de Holland Park, Kensington, Churchill Arms, proche de 3 lignes de métro dont la central line...
Quartier magnifique.
Des hôtes réactifs avec qui la communication est facile par message via Airbnb.
Le petit plus, des clés que l’on n’a pas peur de perdre, elles sont électroniques via une application sur notre téléphone.
J’espère pouvoir revenir un jour !

Lovely air bnb in such a cute neighborhood! 10 min walk from Nottingham Station which is convenient. Very clean, lots of extra towels, and a drinking water machine on the same floor. Klevio app for keys was very easy to use, would be better if more than one person could download the keys in case one of us came back at different times. There’s also a cute little patio outside. My friend and I really enjoyed staying here, definitely recommend!!

My Partner and I had a great stay, the flat is better in person than the pictures. I like to think we are tech savvy but when checking in using Klevio oddly I was looking for somewhere to swipe the phone so did stand at the front of the property for a good 10 minutes debating if it was the right one. The flat was immaculate and the small balcony space a nice little bonus. Would love to stay again if we were visiting London.
We had a lovely stay here! It was super clean and in a perfect location. I would highly recommend.

Billie and Max,
We had a great time staying at your place. The room was better than described, it was clean and so comfortable. We enjoyed the large windows and balcony. We were located close to bus lines and the tube. The area has a lot of restaurants and boutiques to enjoy. And we did. We ate right around the corner at “Churchill Arms” a quaint pub that served some of the best Thai food we’ve ever had. We couldn’t have been happier with our stay in London and hope to come back soon. Thank you for making our visit superb.
Everything we hoped to find for our stay in London! Great location, clean and stylish.  We enjoyed our stay!

Billie & Max's place was so charming! The location is perfect and very central. The flat itself was sparkling clean, and we loved staying here. Loved the keyless entry so we didn't have to worry about carrying around keys. Billie & Max were extremely responsive and made our experience great. Would definitely book again.
Billie and Max are great hosts and their place is super cute and has an amazing location. They were really helpful and provided lots of support!
Très bel immeuble, bel emplacement et jolie décoration, et appartement très propre, à 2 pas de Kensington et non loin de Notting Hill. Nous vous recommandons !

Firstly, the location is stunning. You are basically a few minutes away from Kensington High Street and the balcony is just fabulous. It is a lovely room and incredibly plush. Communication from the host was outstanding. They were brilliant at responding when we had questions and even made up the sofa bed for us on special request. I thibk you would be hard pressed to find lovlier hosts or location. Unfortunately there was a stain on the bed and we just couldn't work out how to use the hob so had to give up. There also isnt a plug on the kitchen unit so we had to move the kettle next to the bed but all in all we didn't mind. The Klevia key would be easy if it told people to swipe right on the key. I spent 5 mins tapping it but realised you just need to swipe it then tap. I would stay in the room again tomorrow - it is truly special.
Wonderful, relaxing stay in Kensington. Perfect location in a quaint neighborhood. The hosts were very quick to respond to all questions. Cannot wait for our next stay!
Great location. Really stylish suite. Clean and quiet. Good for a couple. Pretty tight for a family.

This beautiful flat located near the Kensington High Street, Nothing Hill and Hyde Park is perfect for discovering the culture and lifestyle of London like a londoner. It is perfectly clean and nice, better than in pictures.
I recommend it especially to young couples.
The apartment is in the perfect location, close to public transportation and many cute cafes and restaurants. Lovely for a weekend stay in London with my mother and sister.

Had a great stay at Billie and Max’s place. Amazing location. Unfortunately, we didn’t get the opportunity to meet Billie or Max. All of the keys in this Airbnb are electronic - AKA don’t let your phone run out of battery when you’re out during that day!!! Also, the power went out and so we weren’t able to enter the building until someone from the inside was able to let us in.
They are wonderful hosts and very kind to our needs. I highly recommend staying here! We would like to come back!
Great location and very clean!
Great location, very comfy. Would definitely stay again. Thx.
Lovely stay. Great location. Pretty building. Clean and comfy. Liked the klevio electronic key.

Le studio est vraiment très très bien!
Situation idéale pour visiter Londres.
Quartier chic et vraiment charmant où on se sent en sécurité.
Tout est disponible à 5 mins à pied du studio donc vraiment parfait.
Billie et Max sont très réactifs et à l’écoute. Ils nous ont permis de laisser nos bagages avant l’heure d’arrivée, c’est très appréciable!
Le studio est très agréable et bien équipé. Il dispose d’un petit balcon très sympa.
Nous prévoyons de revenir à Londres et séjournerons à nouveau chez Billie et Max, c’est certain.

The space was very clean and there were plenty of towels. We liked the location and enjoyed exploring the area. The Airbnb was not what we expected. We don’t like the hotel feel, which was how it felt. But if that’s what you like this is a really nice place.
门外风景非常美 非常安静的小区

My husband, 7YO, and I just got back from our 2-night stay at Billie and Max's studio.
Pros - Location (walking distance to Kensington High Street, Hyde Park, Tube, grocery stores, cute cafes, Dishoom); Cleanliness (studio was spotless and they open the futon for us); Communication (we got in very early in the AM and were able to keep our bags in their office until the studio was ready. Billie/Max's team was very kind and polite when we dropped off bags); Technology (keyless entry with an app on your phone).
Cons - Size (It's a studio so we expected it to be small. It was fine for the 3 of us for 2 nights but it's not ideal if you need a lot of space); Kitchen (the studio had a hot plate, small dorm-size fridge, electric kettle, and the basics but it's not somewhere you can cook an elaborate meal. We weren't planning on eating in so we just used the kettle for tea and the fridge for water/fruit).
Thanks Billie and Max!
Excellent response for answers to our questions.
Gorgeous studio in a great neighborhood walking distance to Kensington Palace, Notting Hill, Portobello Road and close to tube. Coffee, tea, fridge, toaster, shampoo, etc all handy. Wonderful stay!

Wonderful all around. I can’t say enough things about this place.

Location is great- a quick walk from two underground stations and Kensington Palace and Gardens. Also super quiet and stylish.

Apartment was super clean and updated for being in an older style home.

The hosts were fabulous! Quick to respond and great recommendations for anything you needed. They are very friendly and we’re very accommodating with holding our luggage until check-in.

If this one is on your list, don’t pass it up!
위치는 좋았습니다. 전자렌지가 없어 음식을 해먹기에는 조금 불편했습니다
Really easy check in and out,  literally around the corner from Kensington high street, Hyde park and so much more!

A great few days in London. The location was perfect considering we’d never been to London before! It was in the main tourist spot which was great but located so close to everything. We felt like locals walking the streets. The studio was clean and had everything and more that we needed! Once we got the wifi working downstairs it was easy to get in and out of the building.
Excellent location, clean, with a very cosy bed.

Our expectations were exceeded during our stay in this wonderful little studio. The flat is furnished beautifully, the bed was super comfortable and was in a great location. Billie and Max were great communicators - thank you for your hospitality!

The studio apartment is very nice, very clean with a comfortable bed, lots of towels and plenty of hot water for showering.  It’s within walking distance of the tube and buses and close to shops, restaurants and a major grocery store.    It’s perfect for two guests and I would recommend.
Small, but efficient studio accommodation. Tastefully decorated. Highly secure, using Klevio entry. Lots of charm.

Billie and Max place is an amazing for someone looking for a good night of sleep while spending the entire day out in the city. It’s located in an amazing area (quite central) and the neighborhood is beautiful! Definitely we will consider this place next time visiting London.

This was the perfect place to stay to explore London.  The studio was clean and had plenty of storage space for our bags.  The location is great as well.   You can get anywhere in London very easily.  I would highly recommend this rental to a couple or someone traveling alone.  It is the perfect space to come back and relax in after a long day out.

London is a large city. If your looking for something close to Hyde Park this place was within 20-30 minutes walking distance, and less than 10 minutes from the tube station. Quiet  and safe area in the city. Not able to utilize kitchen area. For us it was basically a place to sleep and shower.
Great communication with the host. Loved the apartment and the service from A-Z.
Billie and Max's flat is very comfortable and beautifully clean. The communication before, during and after our stay was perfect, and we would highly recommend this flat.
Nice cosy place at a premier location
The apartment was the perfect place to see London. Walking distance to Notting Hill and Hyde Park, easy access to the Tube, clean, stylish. Would definitely recommend staying here!

We had a great stay. The area is really lovely...good to be out of the tourist areas of London. The app is fantastic for check in and really makes it a lot easier. The apartment building is beautiful...lovely to stay in a real Kensington style house. The room itself was perfect and had everything we needed. Billie always responded quickly and helped when we needed. Definitely recommend!
Super cute place to stay in London! Very clear instructions and communication.

This apartment is in the perfect location!  Close to all the major tube stops and in a quiet beautiful neighborhood.  If you walk over 1-2 streets you are close to markets, pubs, shops, and transit where all the action is.  The apartment was more luxurious than we even expected from the pictures and Billie and Max were extremely accommodating for everything we needed.  I would definitely stay here again.
Great place
Such a cute location!!!
Brilliant stay. The studio was beautifully stylish, location was fabulous and communication excellent. Highly recommend

I needed a place to stay on my own while in London and Billie & Max’s Studio was perfect. The location is very close to public transportation, making it very easy to get around. There are local shops/grocery stores/restaurants right around the corner. The space itself is exactly as advertised and had plenty of amenities. The balcony out front is a wonderful bonus!
Great location, beautiful flat, easy check-in. Highly recommend.

My stay at Billie and Max’s place was great. The location was awesome and the studio itself was up to date and very clean. The ceilings were high so it felt very spacious! The studio is near two underground stations so getting around London is super easy. We didn’t Uber at all! There is so much to do within walking distance of the Airbnb so that was a plus. The neighborhood is super safe at night and it really has that London feeling. Overall I would love to stay at this Airbnb again!

We had such a lovely stay. The space was beautiful and comfortable, and the host was very flexible and understanding with our need to check in 1 day late after an unexpected flight delay. Great neighborhood close to a cozy cafe, too!

Love this space. Everything one needs... Excellent location. Hostess attentive, prompt at responding to inquiries. The building and flat are beautiful, well maintained, quiet, and the common area shells really good-- minty or something.

A lovely quiet and comfortable apartment in a fantastic position close to shops.cafe,restaurants and the underground. Comfortable bed, good amenities to be able to make breakfast and an easy meal. Clean and stylish apartment. We would definitely recommend this apartment to couples wanting to explore London and surrounding areas. Very good value for money.

This place is absolutely stunning and in such a great area! There are two train stations nearby that makes this place idea. It’s super cute as well. Billie and max have a Manuel with awesome recommendations as well. They responded quickly when we had trouble opening the door but once we got a hang of the app, it was a breeze. We just wished we stayed longer. Thanks again Billie and Max! (:

This was a terrific Airbnb experience. Communication was excellent and the check in process was smooth and easy. The flat is exactly as depicted in the photos. Stylish and sparkling clean with a very comfortable bed. The neighborhood is fantastic. If you are looking for a place to stay while you're in London look no further. This place is great.

L’appartement est très bien situé dans un environnement agréable et calme.
L’appartement est très propre et conforme à la description.
Les hôtes nous ont fournis toutes les informations nécessaires.
Le système d’acces par Klevio est facile d’utilisation et très pratique.
Je recommande vivement cette location.
Great apartment ! Nice neighborhood ! easy to use ! clean, we love this place !
100% recommend. Amazing location, beautiful apartment. Very clean. We will be back!!
Sehr schönes sauberes Apartment. Die Lage ist super, es sind ca 5 Minuten bis zur U-Bahn.
Incredible and lovely place for staying in London. Right in the heart of Kensington, comfy studio, everything you need at minutes walk and Billie & Max’s hospitality is awesome. Strong recommend.
An air bnb as it is supposed to be! Neat, clean, excellent service and great location.
Fantastic location and really helpful hosts for someone not familiar with London

We only had the chance to enjoy one evening at this beautiful site. However, everything was clean concise and everyone was very helpful. We definitely would have stayed longer and would stay here again! We were able to check our bags in early. Find our location easily and access the space securely. The location was perfect for us and walking distance from many amenities and attractions. Highly recommend.
